TL; DR:
太长不看：

Reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF) is a leading technique to adapt the outputs of generative models to be preferred by human and has achieved tremendous success in ChatGPT by OpenAI, Claude by Anthropic, and Gemini by Google. Inspired by these successes, preference optimization (a slightly more general terminology that also contains the RL-free algorithms) has attracted significant attentions in the past year. In this blog, we aim to present a comprehensive introduction to the frontier research in this exciting field, explore the on-going challenges, and discuss the interesting research problems for the future.
从人类反馈中进行强化学习（RLHF）是一种使生成模型的输出更符合人类偏好的领先技术，在 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT、Anthropic 的 Claude 和 Google 的 Gemini 中取得了巨大成功。受这些成功的启发，偏好优化（一个稍微更通用的术语，也包含无强化学习算法）在过去一年中引起了极大的关注。在本博客中，我们旨在对这一令人兴奋的领域的前沿研究进行全面介绍，探讨正在进行的挑战，并讨论未来有趣的研究问题。

1 Prerequisites

1 预备知识

1.0 Alignment Objective

1.0 对齐目标

We start from illustrating the concept of aligning artificial intelligence (AI) systems. Our dicussion largely follows the work, Artificial Intelligence, Values, and Alignment, by Iason Gabriel.
我们从阐释使人工智能（AI）系统协调一致的概念开始。我们的讨论在很大程度上遵循了伊森·加布里埃尔（Iason Gabriel）的《人工智能、价值观与协调一致》一书的内容。

The overall objective of AI alignment is to ensure that AI systems act in accordance with human instructions, intentions, values and ethics. The aim is to create AI that not only performs tasks effectively but also understands and aligns with the broader context of human intentions, moral principles, and societal norms. This is crucial as AI technologies become more advanced and autonomous, to prevent unintended consequences and ensure that AI contributes positively to human well-being and societal progress.
人工智能对齐的总体目标是确保人工智能系统按照人类的指令、意图、价值观和道德规范行事。其目的是创建不仅能有效执行任务，而且能理解并与人类意图、道德原则和社会规范的更广泛背景保持一致的人工智能。随着人工智能技术变得更加先进和自主，这一点至关重要，以防止意外后果并确保人工智能对人类福祉和社会进步做出积极贡献。

❗ We hereby emphasize that alignment is to restrict AI behavior to follow human instructions/values/ethics, is not to improve the performance of AI on particular tasks. Or, in another word, alignment is about fine-tuning AI to achieve a specific objective.
❗我们在此强调，对齐是为了限制人工智能的行为以遵循人类的指令/价值观/道德规范，而不是为了提高人工智能在特定任务上的性能。或者，换句话说，对齐是关于微调人工智能以实现特定目标。

The specific alignment objectives, however, are still in debate these days, and can vary a lot following different ethics or moral philosophy, e.g. consequentialism, deontology, and virtue ethics. Below, we list only a few options discussed by Iason.
然而，具体的校准目标目前仍存在争议，并且会因不同的伦理或道德哲学（例如后果主义、义务论和德性伦理学）而有很大差异。下面，我们仅列出 Iason 所讨论的几个选项。

Instructions: the agent does what I instruct it to do
指令：该代理会按照我指示的去做

Expressed intentions: the agent does what I intend it to do
表达的意图：该主体按照我的意图行事

Revealed preferences: the agent does what my behaviour reveals I prefer
显示性偏好：主体的行为显示出我所偏好的东西

Informed preferences or desires: the agent does what I would want it to do if I were rational and informed
知情偏好或愿望：若我是理性且知情的，该主体会做我希望它做的事

Interest or well-being: the agent does what is in my interest, or what is best for me, objectively speaking
利益或福祉：从客观上讲，agent做的是符合我利益的事，或者是对我最有利的事

Values: the agent does what it morally ought to do, as defined by the individual or society
价值观：主体按照个人或社会所定义的道德规范去做应该做的事

Since we focus more on the techniques for AI alignment, we skip the details about the above points. But, we highly recomment Iason’s paper, Artificial Intelligence, Values, and Alignment, and Paul Christiano’s blogs on https://ai-alignment.com, for readers who are insterested in the ethical and philosophical discussion about alignment.
由于我们更关注人工智能对齐的技术，我们略过了上述要点的细节。但是，对于对关于对齐的伦理和哲学讨论感兴趣的读者，我们强烈推荐 Iason 的论文《人工智能、价值观与对齐》以及 Paul Christiano 在 https://ai-alignment.com 上的博客。

In the following of this blog, we mainly discuss the techniques to align large language models (LLMs).
在本博客的后续内容中，我们主要讨论对齐大型语言模型的技术（LLMs）。

Why does alignment come after SFT?

为何对齐在监督式微调之后？

To develop an LLM, there are usulaly three steps. 1) pre-training; 2) supervised/instruction fine-tuning; 3) alignment. More details are introduced in Section 1.1. below.
要开发一个LLM，通常有三个步骤。1）预训练；2）有监督/指令微调；3）对齐。更多细节在下面的 1.1 节中介绍。

We’d like to starting from clarifying the relationship between SFT and alignment.
我们想从阐明 SFT 和对齐之间的关系开始。

Given which ever objective of alignment (among the 6 possibilities from Iason above), for an LLM to be aligned, a prerequisite is the ability to strictly follow the instructions from users. So, before we align LLMs towards the preferences/interests/values of humans, the models need to be able to understand and follow the intructions. The most efficient and promising method so far could be SFT.
无论给定伊森提出的六种对齐目标中的哪一种，对于LLM要实现对齐，一个先决条件是能够严格遵循用户的指示。因此，在我们将LLMs朝着人类的偏好/兴趣/价值观进行对齐之前，模型需要能够理解并遵循这些指示。到目前为止，最有效和最有前景的方法可能是 SFT。

⚠️ PS: we have tried to skip SFT and align a pre-trained only LLM by DPO (a specific alignment algorithm). We found that such a method can improve the instruction following ability of LLMs, but is super inefficient as it took a whole training epoch for the model to understand the task, regardless of whether the model can generate proper responses.
⚠️ 注：我们尝试跳过 SFT 并通过 DPO（一种特定的对齐算法）仅对预训练的LLM进行对齐。我们发现，这种方法可以提高LLMs的指令遵循能力，但效率极低，因为模型需要整整一个训练周期才能理解任务，而不论该模型是否能够生成适当的响应。

1.1 Pre-training and Instruction-following Fine-tuning

1.1 预训练与遵循指令的微调

We summarize the LLM training pipeline as follows.
我们将LLM训练流程总结如下。

  • Autoregressive language model generates one token at a time, and each new token is dependent on the tokens that came before it. For instance, for a sentence s=[s1,s2,⋯,s|s|], the probability is decomposed as
    自回归语言模型一次生成一个标记，每个新标记都依赖于之前的标记。例如，对于一个句子 s=[s1,s2,⋯,s|s|] ，其概率分解为

    (1)P(s)=P(s1)×P(s2|s1)×P(s3|s1:2)⏟Conditioned on the tokens came before×⋯×P(s|s||s1:|s|−1)

    Following the convention of the literature, we use π to denote the language model in subsequent discussion.
    按照文献中的惯例，我们在后续讨论中使用 π 来表示语言模型。

  • Pre-training: the objective of this step is to maximise the likelihood of an unlabelled corpus of N1 sentences {si}i=1N1, usually through minimizing the following negative log-likelihood (NLL) objective
    预训练：此步骤的目标是使未标记的 N1 句子 {si}i=1N1 语料库的可能性最大化，通常是通过最小化以下负对数似然（NLL）目标来实现

    (2)minπL(π)=−∑i=1N1∑j=1|si|log⁡π(sji|s1:j−1i)⏟log-likelihood of one sentence for the autoregressive model.

    Intuitively, pre-training is for LLMs to fit on the universal distribution over human languages and obtain the ``knowledge'' implied in that distribution.
    直观地说，预训练是为了让LLMs适应人类语言的通用分布，并获得该分布中所蕴含的“知识”。

  • Supervised/Instruction-following Fine-tuning: after the pre-training, an LLM is then fine-tuned on a collection of N2(N2≪N1) prompts {x} along with their labelled responses {a} from human labller through minimizing the following NLL objective:
    监督/指令遵循微调：在预训练之后，一个LLM随后在一组 N2(N2≪N1) prompt {x} 以及来自人类标注者的带标签的响应 {a} 上进行微调，通过最小化以下 NLL 目标：

    (3)minπL(π)−∑i=1N2∑j=1ailog⁡π(aji|a1:j−1i,xi)⏟log-likelihood of one completion for the autoregressive model..

    where π is initialized as a copy of the pre-trained model. Intuitively, this step is to teach the model to follow the instructions from the humans.
    其中， π 被初始化为预训练模型的副本。直观地说，这一步是为了教导模型遵循人类的指令。

  • Alignment (Preference Optimization): after SFT, the last step before deploying the LLM is the RLHF. In short, preference optimization is the leading technique to adapt the output generation to be aligned towards human values and is a key component to make Chat-GPT from GPT-3.
    对齐（偏好优化）：在进行 SFT 之后，部署LLM之前的最后一步是 RLHF。简而言之，偏好优化是使输出生成适应人类价值观的主要技术，并且是使 Chat-GPT 从 GPT-3 发展而来的关键组成部分。

    The classic RL-based preference optimization (known as reinforcement learning from human feedback, RLHF) is first developed in Christiano et. al. 2017 and Stiennon et. al. 2020, and then further developed by the Instruct-GPT and Claude. Recently, another line of works focused on designing RL-free algorithms that directly optimize LLMs with human preferences.
    基于经典强化学习的偏好优化（被称为从人类反馈中进行强化学习，RLHF）最初由 Christiano 等人（2017 年）和 Stiennon 等人（2020 年）提出，随后 Instruct-GPT 和 Claude 对其进行了进一步发展。最近，另一系列工作专注于设计无需强化学习的算法，直接根据人类偏好优化LLMs。

    By whichever way, the core idea behind the alignment is to learn human value functions'' from the preference data, so we'll refer this step as preference optimization'' in the following content.
    无论通过何种方式，对齐背后的核心思想是在以下内容中学习“ human value functions'' from the preference data, so we'll refer this step as 偏好优化”。

(The figure is borrowed from Yao Fu's blog)
（该图借自姚福的博客）

Why isn’t supervised/instruction-finetuning sufficient to achieve alignment?

为何有监督/指令微调不足以实现对齐？

Another natural question about supervsed/instruction-finetuning (SFT) and alignment is about whether SFT alone can achieve the aligment objective. We hereby provide some pilot results from a stand-alone blog of ours to support that SFT alone might not be sufficient to align LLMs.
关于监督/指令微调（SFT）和对齐的另一个自然问题是仅 SFT 是否可以实现对齐目标。我们在此提供一些来自我们独立博客的初步结果，以支持仅 SFT 可能不足以实现对齐LLMs。

Our key hypothesis is:
我们的关键假设是：

Given a set of samples D={(xi,yi)}i=1N **generated by a target function ftgt, if we train a model π on D, π is not neccessarily learning ftgt. Instead. π might learn a simpler function fsmp that can generate D as well.

给定一组由目标函数 ftgt 生成的样本 D={(xi,yi)}i=1N ，如果我们在 D 上训练一个模型 π ， π 不一定在学习 ftgt 。相反， π 可能会学习一个更简单的函数 fsmp ，该函数也可以生成 D 。

To verify the above hypothesis, given a prompt xi and the corresponding learning target yi+, we then generate the following kinds of responses to the same prompt xi:
为验证上述假设，给定一个prompt xi 以及相应的学习目标 yi+ ，然后我们针对同一prompt xi 生成以下各类响应：

  1. Rejected response yi−: a response that is sampled from ftgt(xi) as well, but is less preferred by humans, compared to yi+.
    被拒绝的响应 yi− ：一种同样从 ftgt(xi) 中抽样得到的响应，但与 yi+ 相比，人类对其偏好程度较低。

  2. Paraphrase of rejected response y~i−: a paraphrase of the REJECTED response yi−, done by Gemini-Pro.
    被拒绝的回应 y~i− 的释义：由 Gemini-Pro 完成的对被拒绝的回应 yi− 的释义。

  3. Variant response yi′: a responses generated by Gemini-Pro to xi, thus yi′∈D but should be out of the distribution specified by ftgt(xi).
    变异响应 yi′ ：由 Gemini-Pro 生成的针对 xi 的响应，因此 yi′∈D ，但应超出 ftgt(xi) 指定的分布范围。

  4. Random response yj+: the preferered response to a randomly selected prompt xj. N.B. the index is j here instead of i, thus yj+∈D but is mapped from a different xj. yj+ should be totally out of the distribution specified by ftgt(xi).
    随机响应 yj+ ：对随机选择的prompt xj 的首选响应。注意，此处索引是 j 而不是 i ，因此 yj+∈D ，但它是从不同的 xj 映射而来。 yj+ 应该完全在 ftgt(xi) 指定的分布之外。

  5. Non-response y¯i: a random sentence generated by Gemini-Pro, thus not a response, i.e. y¯i∉D.
    无回应 y¯i ：由 Gemini-Pro 随机生成的一个句子，因此不是一个回应，即 y¯i∉D 。

Now, let's see how the likelihood of the above kinds of responses change over SFT. The model π is Pythia-2.8b. N.B. the learning target is ONLY the "SFT target" yi+!
现在，让我们看看上述各类反应的可能性如何随 SFT 变化。模型 π 是 Pythia - 2.8b。注意，学习目标仅为“SFT 目标” yi+ ！

In short, we observed the following three ponts:
总之，我们观察到以下三点：

  • All log-probabilities log⁡π(⋅|xi) increased over SFT except for the "non-response" y¯i.
    除了“无回应” y¯i 外，在 SFT 中所有的对数概率 log⁡π(⋅|xi) 都有所增加。

  • Log-probability of different kinds of responses increase in different degrees.
    不同种类响应的对数概率以不同程度增加。

    • The increamental of log-probability from high to low is: Δlog⁡π(yi+|xi)>Δlog⁡π(yi−|xi)>Δlog⁡π(yj+|xi)>Δlog⁡π(y~i−|xi)>Δlog⁡π(yi′|xi)>Δlog⁡π(y¯i|xi).
      从高到低的对数概率增量为： Δlog⁡π(yi+|xi) >Δlog⁡π(yi−|xi) >Δlog⁡π(yj+|xi) >Δlog⁡π(y~i−|xi) >Δlog⁡π(yi′|xi) >Δlog⁡π(y¯i|xi) 。

  • Log-probability of "rejected responses" log⁡π(yi−|xi) is always higher than that of the "proper responses" log⁡π(yi+|xi).
    “被拒绝的回应” log⁡π(yi−|xi) 的对数概率总是高于“恰当的回应” log⁡π(yi+|xi) 的对数概率。

The results above suggest that SFT is actually learning to generate "responses" in general, not even only the "responses" to xi, since yj+ also increases. More interestingly, the log-probability of "rejected responses" yi− is alway higher than that of the "proper responses" yi+, which suggests that only SFT cannot achieve alignment of LLMs.
上述结果表明，SFT 实际上是在学习生成一般性的“响应”，甚至不仅仅是对 xi 的“响应”，因为 yj+ 也有所增加。更有趣的是，“拒绝响应” yi− 的对数概率始终高于“正确响应” yi+ ，这表明仅 SFT 无法实现LLMs的对齐。

⚠️ We ran the above experiment in a limited scale, whehter the above conclusion holds more generally remains exploration. If you’re intereted in digging deeper, feel free to contact us and we’re happy to collaborate on exploring this question!
⚠️我们在有限的规模下进行了上述实验，上述结论是否更普遍地成立仍需探索。如果您有兴趣深入研究，请随时与我们联系，我们很乐意合作探讨这个问题！

1.2 Preference Data Collection, Reward, and Bradley-Terry Model

1.2 偏好数据收集、奖励与BT模型

We formally define some useful notions and concepts used for the subsequent discussion.
我们正式定义一些用于后续讨论的有用概念和观念。

  • Initial model: we assume that we have an initial checkpoint π0 that undergoes pre-training and supervised finetuning (instruction-following training).
    初始模型：我们假定我们有一个初始检查点 π0 ，它经过预训练和有监督的微调（指令跟随训练）。

  • Preference signal: distinct from the SFT, where we learn from labeled data, the RLHF learns from relative feedback. Formally, for each comparison pair (x,a1,a2), the preference oracle satisfies P(x,a1,a2)=P(a1≻a2|x)∈[0,1], indicating the probability of a1 is preferred over a2 given the prompt x.
    偏好信号：与我们从有标签数据中学习的 SFT 不同，RLHF 从相对反馈中学习。正式地，对于每个比较对 (x,a1,a2) ，偏好预言机满足 P(x,a1,a2)=P(a1≻a2|x)∈[0,1] ，这表示在给定prompt x 的情况下， a1 比 a2 更受青睐的概率。

  • Preference data collection: we assume that the prompts are sampled from a distribution d0 and we have two behavior policies (π1,π2):
    偏好数据收集：我们假定prompt是从分布 d0 中采样的，并且我们有两种行为策略 (π1,π2) ：

    (4)x∼d0,(a1,a2)∼(π1,π2),y∼Bernoulli(P(x,a1,a2)).

    where a random preference signal y=1 indicates a1 is better and y=0 indicates a2 is better.
    其中随机偏好信号 y=1 表示 a1 更好， y=0 表示 a2 更好。

We summarize the three learning stages of LLM as follows.
我们将LLM的三个学习阶段总结如下。

 

Bradley-Terry Model: alignment to reward model BT模型：与奖励模型的对齐

The most widely used preference model in practice is the Bradley Terry model, which assumes that there exists a ground truth reward function r∗(x,a)∈R such that given a prompt x and two responses a1,a2, the probability of a1 is being preferred is
在实践中应用最广泛的偏好模型是BT模型，该模型假定存在一个基本真实奖励函数 r∗(x,a)∈R ，使得给定一个prompt x 和两个响应 a1,a2 ， a1 被偏好的概率为

(5)P(a1,a2,x):=P(a1≻a2|x)=exp⁡(r∗(x,a1))exp⁡(r∗(x,a1))+exp⁡(r∗(x,a2))=σ(r∗(x,a1)−r∗(x,a2)),

where σ(z)=1/(1+exp⁡(−z)) is the sigmoid function. Then, the goal is to update the initial π0 to bias toward high-rewards responses. The common goal used in practice is to get a new policy that has high expected reward, while still stays close to the initial model (so that the knowledge from pre-trained and SFT stages is preserved). To this end, in practice, we usually use the following KL-regularized target:
其中 σ(z)=1/(1+exp⁡(−z)) 是 sigmoid 函数。然后，目标是更新初始的 π0 ，使其倾向于高回报的响应。在实践中使用的常见目标是获得具有高预期回报的新策略，同时仍然接近初始模型（以便保留预训练和 SFT 阶段的知识）。为此，在实践中，我们通常使用以下 KL 正则化目标：

(6)J(π)=Ex∼d0Ea∼π(⋅|x)[r∗(x,a)+ηlog⁡π0(a|x)π(a|x)]=Ex∼d0[Ea∼π(⋅|x)[r∗(x,a)]⏟Reward maximization−ηKL(π(⋅|x)‖π0(⋅|x))⏟Stay close to initial model],

Two main motivations for adding an additional regularization KL term.
添加额外正则化 KL 项的两个主要动机。

  • The reward function r∗ can differ from the real-world user experience because the BT model may not fully capture the complicated preference. In this case, imposing heavy optimization pressure on reward maximization can lead to reward hacking, meaning that the model will exploit the weakness of the imperfect reward models, leading to a high reward but a poor real-world performance.
    奖励函数 r∗ 可能与现实世界中的用户体验不同，因为 BT 模型可能无法完全捕捉复杂的偏好。在这种情况下，对奖励最大化施加沉重的优化压力可能会导致奖励作弊，这意味着模型将利用不完善奖励模型的弱点，从而获得高奖励，但在现实世界中的表现不佳。

  • Even the BT model can capture the human preference, the reward-maximizer will converge to some ``optimal'' response and is deterministic. The KL term can guarantee the solution is randomized and the diversity of responses is beneficial in real applications. The η may reflect our confidence toward the reward function.
    即使 BT 模型可以捕捉人类偏好，奖励最大化者也会收敛到某种“最优”响应且是确定性的。KL 项可以保证solution是随机的，并且响应的多样性在实际应用中是有益的。 η 可能反映了我们对奖励函数的信心。

  • The KL regularization helps to improve training stability.
    KL 正则化有助于提高训练稳定性。

1.3 On/off-policy and On/off-line Learning in the Context of Alignment

1.3 在对齐背景下的on/off-policy与on/off-line learning

Before diving into the details of RL-based and RL-free alignment algorithms, we’d like to first clarify the definition of the following key concepts and give some examples of them along with them.
在深入探讨基于强化学习的和无强化学习的对齐算法的细节之前，我们想首先阐明以下关键概念的定义，并给出一些它们的示例以及与之相关的内容。

  • On-policy learning: the learning of πt is on-policy, if ai∼πt(⋅|xi). That is, the responses are sampled from πt with xi as inputs.
    on-policy学习：如果 ai∼πt(⋅|xi) ，则 πt 的学习是on-policy上的。也就是说，以 xi 作为输入，从 πt 中采样响应。

  • Off-policy learning: the learning of πt is off-policy, if ai≁πt(⋅|xi). That is, the responses are not following the distirubtion specified by πt with xi as inputs.
    off-policy学习：如果 ai≁πt(⋅|xi) ，则 πt 的学习是off-policy的。也就是说，以 xi 作为输入时，响应并不遵循由 πt 指定的分布。

❗ The following methods may lead to not strictly on-policy learning: 1) increasing sampling temperature; and 2) rejectiong sampling with best-of-n to ajust the distribution of ai. However, in both cases, the distribution shift is limited/bounded, particularly for 2).
❗ 以下方法可能导致并非严格遵循on-policy learning：1）提高采样温度；2）使用 n 中选优的拒绝采样来调整 ai 的分布。然而，在这两种情况下，分布的偏移是有限的/有界的，特别是对于 2）。

An illustration of the distribution shift issue in preference dataset collection.
偏好数据集收集过程中分布偏移问题的说明。

  • Online learning: the learning of πt is online, if the preference oracle P(x,a1,a2) or its approximator P^(x,a1,a2) can be queried over training. According to the frequency of querying the (approximated) preference oracle, the online learning algorighms can be further catogerised as follows.
    在线学习：如果可以在训练过程中查询偏好预言机 P(x,a1,a2) 或其近似器 P^(x,a1,a2) ，则 πt 的学习是在线的。根据查询（近似）偏好预言机的频率，在线学习算法可以进一步分类如下。

    • Squential/fully/batch-wise online: P(x,a1,a2) or P^(x,a1,a2) is queried for every batch.
      顺序/完全/逐批在线：对每一批都查询 P(x,a1,a2) 或 P^(x,a1,a2) 。

    • Iterative online: P(x,a1,a2) or P^(x,a1,a2) is queried once every T batches.
      迭代在线：每 T 批查询一次 P(x,a1,a2) 或 P^(x,a1,a2) 。

    • Hybrid online: start with an offline dataset (e.g. all the open-source preference datasets) but include online exploration in the following training.
      混合在线：从离线数据集（例如所有开源偏好数据集）开始，但在后续训练中包含在线探索。

  • Offline learning: the learning of πt is offline, if P(x,a1,a2) or P^(x,a1,a2) can only be queried ahead of training.
    离线学习：如果 P(x,a1,a2) 或 P^(x,a1,a2) 只能在训练前进行查询，那么 πt 的学习是离线的。

In pratice, the two dimensions above (on/off-policy and on/offline) are usually NOT orthogonal. Thus, we showcase several alignment methods following the categories defined above, to further clarify these concepts.
在实践中，上述两个维度（on/off-policy和on/off-line learning）通常并非正交。因此，我们按照上述定义的类别展示了几种对齐方法，以进一步阐明这些概念。

  1. PPO with a fixed reward model: on-policy but offline (sampling responses from πt → on-policy, a fixed reward model → offline).
    具有固定奖励模型的 PPO：on-policy但offline（从 πt 采样响应→策略内，固定奖励模型→离线）

  2. PPO with a separate reward model for each πt: on-policy and online (because a new reward model is trained by querying P(x,a1,a2) nor P^(x,a1,a2) to label samples from πt).
    PPO 为每个 πt 配备单独的奖励模型：on-policy且online（因为通过查询 P(x,a1,a2) 或 P^(x,a1,a2) 以从 πt 标记样本来训练新的奖励模型）。

  3. (Vanilla) DPO on a fixed and pre-collected dataset: off-policy and offline (responses pre-collected from other LLM → off-policy, preferences were pre-annotated and fixed → offline).
    （Vanilla）在固定且预先收集的数据集上的直接策略优化（DPO）：off-policy和offline（从其他LLM预先收集的响应→非策略性，偏好已预先标注且固定→离线）。

  4. Iterative rejection sampling finetuing with a fixed reward model: on-policy but offline (same as case 1).
    具有固定奖励模型的迭代拒绝采样微调：on-policy但offline（与案例 1 相同）。

  5. Iterated online RLHF: on-policy and iterative online (as suggested by the name).
    迭代式在线 RLHF：在线策略式且迭代式（如其名称所示）。

  6. Iterative DPO: on-policy and iterative online (as suggestd by the name).
    迭代式 DPO：on-policy的且迭代的在线式（如其名称所暗示）。

  7. Online DPO: on-policy and (fully) online (as P^(x,a1,a2) is queried for every batch).
    在线 DPO：on-policy且（完全）在线（因为每批都查询 P^(x,a1,a2) ）。

⚠️ All methods with a reward model trained at once: offline, since the reward model will score the responses, and the model won’t query either P(x,a1,a2) or P^(x,a1,a2) over training.
⚠️所有使用一次性训练的奖励模型的方法：offline，因为奖励模型会对响应进行评分，并且该模型在训练过程中不会查询 P(x,a1,a2) 或 P^(x,a1,a2) 。

⚠️ All off-policy methods (so far) imply offline learning: we can always generate on-policy responses given a policy being trained, so it doesn’t make sense when we have accessible P(x,a1,a2) or P^(x,a1,a2) but don’t use them to annotate preference over on-policy responses.
⚠️所有off-policy方法（到目前为止）都意味着离线学习：给定一个正在训练的策略，我们总是可以生成策略内响应，因此当我们可以访问 P(x,a1,a2) 或 P^(x,a1,a2) 但不使用它们来标注对策略内响应的偏好时，这是没有意义的。

2 RLHF: The Classic Framework to Make ChatGPT

2 RLHF：打造 ChatGPT 的经典框架

2.1 Instruct-GPT: a Three-stages Approach

2.1 Instruct-GPT：一种三阶段方法

The most standard RLHF framework is first popularized in 2017 and achieved tremendous successes in subsequent applications like Instruct-GPT, and Claude. The classic framework presented in the Instruct-GPT consists of three steps:
最标准的 RLHF 框架于 2017 年首次推广，并在随后的应用中取得了巨大成功，如 Instruct-GPT 和 Claude。Instruct-GPT 中提出的经典框架包括三个步骤：

Step 1 Preference data collection: collect comparison dataset D using a behavior policy pair π1,π2
步骤 1 偏好数据收集：使用行为策略对 π1,π2 收集比较数据集 D

(7)x∼d0,(a1,a2)∼(π1,π2),y∼Bernoulli(P(x,a1,a2)).

Step 2 Reward modeling: Train a reward function as the maximum likelihood estimation (MLE) of the Bradley-Terry model.
步骤 2 奖励建模：将奖励函数训练为 Bradley-Terry 模型的最大似然估计（MLE）。

(8)ℓD(θ)=∑(x,a1,a2,y)∈Dlog⁡(σ(rθ(x,a1)−rθ(x,a2))).

Step 3 Policy optimization: optimize the policy using PPO with the regularized reward:
第 3 步 策略优化：使用带有正则化奖励的 PPO 来优化策略：

(9)πr(a|x):=arg⁡maxπ[r(x,a)−ηlog⁡π(a|x)π0(a|x)]

Offline and Online RLHF, terminology that differs from the RL literature
离线和在线 RLHF，与 RL 文献有所不同的术语

The framework is referred to as an offline one because we do not further query the oracle P(⋅) along the way. In other words, the key difference between an offline algorithm and an online one is whether we query the preference oracle P(⋅) along the way, instead of generating new responses. In this sense, PPO with a fixed reward model is an offline algorithm.
该框架被称为离线框架，因为我们在此过程中不会进一步查询oracle P(⋅) 。换句话说，离线算法和在线算法的关键区别在于我们是否在此过程中查询偏好oracle P(⋅) ，而不是生成新的响应。从这个意义上说，具有固定奖励模型的 PPO 是一种离线算法。

Usually, the behavior policy is exactly π0. Then, the constructed reward model r is accurate to evaluate the generation from π0. We may expect the reward model r to generalize well beyond the distribution of π0 in the face of the distribution shift along the way of PPO training. Unfortunately, this is not true in general, as demonstrated in ``Scaling Laws for Reward Model Overoptimization''.
通常，行为策略恰好是 π0 。然后，构建的奖励模型 r 可准确评估来自 π0 的生成。我们可能期望奖励模型 r 在 PPO 训练过程中面对分布变化时，能很好地泛化到超出 π0 的分布范围之外。不幸的是，正如在“奖励模型过度优化的缩放定律”中所表明的那样，一般情况下并非如此。

Here, the Gold reward r∗ (the solid line) is a 7B reward model set as the P to label data. The proxy-RM r (the dotted line) is the reward model trained from an offline dataset collected by π0 and labeled by r∗. As we can see, at the initial stage, both the proxy and gold reward increase, meaning that the proxy reward r is accurate and aligns with the gold reward well. However, as KL divergence increases, meaning that the distribution shift becomes serious, the proxy reward keeps increasing but the gold reward decreases.
在此，Gold 奖励 r∗ （实线）是一个 7B 奖励模型，被设置为 P 以标注数据。proxy-RM r （虚线）是从由 π0 收集并由 r∗ 标注的离线数据集中训练的奖励模型。正如我们所看到的，在初始阶段，proxy reward和 Gold reward都增加，这意味着proxy reward r 是准确的，并且与 Gold reward很好地一致。然而，随着 KL 散度增加，意味着分布偏移变得严重，proxy reward持续增加，但 Gold reward下降。

In most of the existing literature, the RLHF algorithms easily move far away from the initial model so that the KL divergence is larger than 20, meaning that there exists a significant distribution shift along the way of preference learning:
在大多数现有文献中，RLHF 算法很容易远离初始模型，以至于 KL 散度大于 20 ，这意味着在偏好学习的过程中存在显著的分布偏移：

(10)|πt(⋅|x)π0(⋅|x)|∞≥exp⁡(20).

See Figure 13 for PPO, Figure 4 for DPO, and Figure 3 for rejection sampling finetuning.
见 PPO 的图 13、DPO 的图 4 以及拒绝采样微调的图 3。

❗ Take-away message: offline RLHF suffers from the distribution shift issue, and the reward generalizes poorly to the out-of-distribution samples (especially the samples with high rewards). Accordingly, when designing RL algorithms to maximize these trained reward models, we must take this factor into consideration.
❗ 要点：离线 RLHF 存在分布偏移问题，奖励对分布外样本（尤其是高奖励样本）的泛化能力较差。因此，在设计 RL 算法以最大化这些训练后的奖励模型时，我们必须考虑到这一因素。

We mention in passing that it is natural to see that the reward model may not generalize well because reward model is fine-tuned from some base pretrained model and ``finetuning typically improves in-distribution generalization, but often performs poorly out-of-distribution, sometimes even degrading performance relative to zero-shot prompting'' .
我们顺便提及，很自然地可以看出，奖励模型可能无法很好地泛化，因为奖励模型是从某些基础预训练模型进行微调的，并且“微调通常会提高分布内的泛化能力，但在分布外的表现往往不佳，有时甚至相对于零样本prompt会降低性能”。

2.2 Online Iterative RLHF

2.2 在线迭代式RLHF

We resort to the Claude project to illustrate the online iterative RLHF as it contains much more details compared to the Instruct-GPT. Starting from scratch, it proceeds as follows
我们借助 Claude 项目来阐释在线迭代式 RLHF，因为与 Instruct-GPT 相比，它包含更多细节。从零开始，其过程如下

  • Step 1 policy training: we train the best RLHF policy we can using all the historical data;
    步骤 1 policy training：我们使用所有历史数据来训练我们所能训练的最佳 RLHF policy；

  • Step 2 data collection: we use the obtained policy to collect new comparison responses and ask the human to label them; the new comparison data is then mixed with all the historical data;
    第 2 步数据收集：我们使用所获得的策略来收集新的对比响应，并要求人类对其进行标注；然后将新的对比数据与所有历史数据混合

  • Step 3 reward modeling and policy optimization: we then train a reward based on new mixture of data and train a new RLHF policy. Then reiterate this process indefinitely.
    第 3 步奖励建模与策略优化：我们随后根据新的数据混合体训练一种奖励，并训练一种新的 RLHF 策略。然后无限重复此过程。

We remark that the framework (and its variants) is also adopted in Instruct-GPT and LLaMA2 project. Here the terminology iterative stresses on a trade-off between the training cost and oracle query frequency, as compared to the fully online setting where all the signals are provided by the humans. It is possible that when the human data is collected in a high frequency, the KL regularization is less important. In contrast, with a sparse update and iterations with the human, it is critical to impose sufficient regularization. For instance, since most of the data for the instruct-GPT is sampled from π0, with some coming from the intermediate checkpoints, the instruct-GPT project further adopts a replay-loss with the pretrained data distribution, and find the optimal KL coefficient is about 0.02. On the other hand, the Claude project seems to interact with the humans much more frequently and a much smaller KL coefficient of 0.001 is used.
我们注意到，该框架（及其变体）也被 Instruct-GPT 和 LLaMA2 项目所采用。这里，术语“迭代”强调的是训练成本和oracle查询频率之间的权衡，与所有信号都由人类提供的完全在线设置相比。有可能当人类数据以高频率收集时，KL 正则化就不那么重要了。相反，在与人类进行稀疏更新和迭代时，施加足够的正则化是至关重要的。例如，由于 Instruct-GPT 的大部分数据是从 π0 采样的，有些来自中间检查点，Instruct-GPT 项目进一步采用了与预训练数据分布的重放损失，并发现最优的 KL 系数约为 0.02 。另一方面，Claude 项目似乎与人类的交互更加频繁，使用的 KL 系数要小得多，为 0.001 。

We summarize some important aspects as follows.
我们将一些重要方面总结如下。

  • Motivation: the main motivation for adopting such an online framework is that the online RLHF policy can help to collect data on the upper end of the reward distribution, which can hardly be sampled from π0. Then, the new data helps to improve reward estimation for the samples from the high-reward regime, thus allowing us to train even better policies.
    动机：采用这种在线框架的主要动机是，在线 RLHF 策略有助于收集奖励分布高端的数据，而这些数据很难从 π0 中采样得到。然后，新数据有助于改进对高奖励机制下样本的奖励估计，从而使我们能够训练出更好的策略。

  • Exploration Strategy since RLHF policy tends to lose output diversity, it is crucial to include certain exploration strategy in step 2 to improve the diversity of data collected through the online process.
    由于 RLHF 策略往往会失去输出的多样性，因此在步骤 2 中纳入某种探索策略以提高通过在线过程收集的数据的多样性至关重要。

  • Hybrid Variant LLaMA2 includes the open-source offline preference datasets in their initial data mixture and keeps them throughout the online RLHF process: they could enable better generalization for the reward model and prevent reward hacking.
    混合变体 LLaMA2 在其初始数据混合中包含开源离线偏好数据集，并在整个在线 RLHF 过程中保留它们：它们可以使奖励模型具有更好的泛化能力，并防止奖励作弊。

  • Training Restart Claude restarts from π0 when training each new RLHF policy, instead of training the same model iteratively. It is not clear whether Instruct-GPT and LLaMA2 adopt the same strategy. Notice that we use all the historical data in each iteration. In this case, restarting from π0 may be helpful for mitigating over-optimization and reward hacking without degenerating the model performance.
    训练重启 当为每个新的 RLHF 策略进行训练时，Claude 从 π0 重新开始，而不是对同一模型进行迭代训练。目前尚不清楚 Instruct-GPT 和 LLaMA2 是否采用相同策略。请注意，我们在每次迭代中使用所有历史数据。在这种情况下，从 π0 重新开始可能有助于减轻过度优化和奖励作弊，同时不会降低模型性能。

A summarization and comparison of the Claude and LLaMA2 frameworks.:
Claude和 LLaMA2 框架的总结与比较。

3 RL-Free framework: SLiC, DPO, IPO, and More

3 无强化学习框架：SLiC、DPO、IPO 及其他

While the DRL-based (PPO) RLHF framework achieves tremendous success in Chat-GPT, the RL step in RLHF is memory-intensive as it requires loading 4 models at the same time:
虽然基于深度强化学习（DRL）的（PPO）强化学习人类反馈（RLHF）框架在 Chat-GPT 中取得了巨大成功，但 RLHF 中的强化学习步骤是内存密集型的，因为它需要同时加载 4 个模型：

  • The LLM policy to be aligned, i.e. the actor in PPO;
    LLMpolicy需进行调整，即 PPO 中的actor；

  • The reward model;
    奖励模型

  • The critic in PPO, which is usually initialized as the reward model;
    PPO 中的critic，其通常被初始化为奖励模型；

  • The reference model to compute KL.
    用于计算 KL 的参考模型

More importantly, tuning the PPO to its best performance is challenging due to the training stability issue and sample efficiency. The successes of the strong closed-source LLMs have not been widely reproduced so far. In view of this, researchers have made efforts to design more stable and efficient algorithms as the alternative approach to the PPO, particularly focusing on the RL-free algorithms.
更重要的是，由于训练稳定性问题和样本效率问题，将 PPO 调整到最佳性能具有挑战性。强大的闭源LLMs的成功案例迄今尚未得到广泛重现。鉴于此，研究人员努力设计更稳定和高效的算法作为 PPO 的替代方法，尤其侧重于无强化学习（RL-free）算法。

3.1 Direct Preference Optimization (DPO) and Online Variants

3.1 直接偏好优化（DPO）及在线变体

The first RL-free alignment algorithm we’re going to introduce naturally follows the RLHF framework, the DPO algorithm introduced by Rafailov et al. (2023). The key inspiration for DPO is a closed-form solution to the RL step in RLHF, and thus an equivalent solution to the optimal policy for RLHF objective.
我们要介绍的第一个无强化学习的对齐算法自然遵循强化学习人类反馈（RLHF）框架，即 Rafailov 等人（2023 年）提出的 DPO 算法。DPO 的关键灵感是 RLHF 中强化学习步骤的闭式解，因此也是 RLHF 目标的最优策略的等效解。

Derivation of the DPO Objective Function Following RLHF

遵循 RLHF 的 DPO 目标函数的推导

Let’s start from how the DPO objective is derived from the RLHF framework. The equivalence between the solution to RLHF and DPO objectives relies on the following two propositions.
让我们从 DPO 目标如何从 RLHF 框架中得出开始。RLHF 与 DPO 目标之间的等价性依赖于以下两个命题。

Proposition 1 For any reward function r, the KL-constrained optimization admits the following closed-form solution:

命题 1 对于任何奖励函数 r ，KL 约束优化具有以下封闭形式的solution：

(11)πr∗(a|x):=arg⁡maxπEx∼d0[Ea∼π(⋅|x)[r(x,a)]−ηKL(π(⋅|x)‖π0(⋅|x))]=1Z(x)π0(a|x)exp⁡(1ηr(x,a)),

where Z(x)=∑a′π0(a′|x)exp⁡(1ηr(x,a′)) is the normalization constant and cannot be directly computed since the action space (all possible responses) is exponentially many in terms of the length. Using this proposition, we can connect the reward with the policy by r→πr. In particular, taking log on both sides, we have
其中 Z(x)=∑a′π0(a′|x)exp⁡(1ηr(x,a′)) 是归一化常数，由于动作空间（所有可能的响应）在长度方面呈指数级增长，因此无法直接计算。利用这个命题，我们可以通过 r→πr 将奖励与策略联系起来。特别是，对两边取对数，我们有

(12)rθ(x,a)=ηlog⁡πθ(a|x)π0(a|x)+ηlog⁡Z(x).

The key observation is that, in the likelihood of the Bradley-Terry model, we care about the reward difference, and the intractable Z(x) cancels out! Specifically, plugging the re-parameterized reward into the likelihood of the BT model, we have the following DPO loss function:
关键的观察结果是，在 Bradley-Terry 模型的似然性中，我们关注奖励差异，而难以处理的 Z(x) 会相互抵消！具体来说，将重新参数化的奖励代入 BT 模型的似然性中，我们得到以下 DPO 损失函数：

(13)ℓDPO(θ)=−∑(x,a+,a−)log⁡σ[ηlog⁡πθ(a+|x)π0(a+|x)−ηlog⁡πθ(a−|x)π0(a−|x)]

The resulting algorithm is called Direct Preference Optimization (DPO). We can skip the reward modeling step and directly optimize the policy by maximizing the above objective on the given preference triplets {(x,a+,a−)}.
所得算法称为直接偏好优化（DPO）。我们可以跳过奖励建模步骤，通过在给定的偏好三元组 {(x,a+,a−)} 上最大化上述目标来直接优化策略。

⚠️ Note that the original DPO work is an offline algorithm and relies on the qualify of the preference dataset. In the original DPO paper, the authors recommend to use the initial checkpoint to collect the dataset similar to the RLHF.
⚠️请注意，原始版本的 DPO 工作是一种离线算法，依赖于偏好数据集的质量。在原始版本的 DPO 论文中，作者建议使用初始检查点来收集类似于 RLHF 的数据集。

Proposition 2 If we only consider the policies π with the same support as π0, then the solutions of the DPO and RLHF are identical.
命题 2：如果我们只考虑与 π0 具有相同support的 policy π ，那么 DPO 和 RLHF 的solution是相同的。

First, we’d like to spend a few lines on explaining the meaning of ``support'' in the above sentence. It refers to the set of sentences strictly positive probability by a given LLM policy. Mathematically, all LLMs with identical vocabulary have the same support, as the softmax function allocate >0 probability to all tokens at every time-step. In reality, this is not the case, as the real numbers are represented in limited precisions.
首先，我们想用几行文字来解释上述句子中“support”的含义。它指的是给定LLM策略下具有严格正概率的句子集合。从数学上讲，具有相同词汇的所有LLMs都具有相同的support，因为 softmax 函数在每个时间步为所有标记分配 >0 概率。在现实中，情况并非如此，因为实数是以有限精度表示的。

Now, let’s consider the equivalence between the optimal policies under DPO and RLHF.
现在，让我们考虑在 DPO 和 RLHF 下的最优策略之间的等价性。

For a given reward function r and the corresponding optimal policy πr∗, it is straightforward to see that the following holds regardless of whether P is a Bradley-Terry model:
对于给定的奖励函数 r 和相应的最优策略 πr∗ ，很容易看出，无论 P 是否为 Bradley-Terry 模型，以下情况都成立：

(14)E(x,a1,a2)[P(a1≻a2|x)log⁡σ(r(x,a1)−r(x,a2))]=E(x,a1,a2)[P(a1≻a2|x)log⁡σ(ηlog⁡(πr∗(a1|x))πref(a1|x))−ηlog⁡(πr∗(a2|x))πref(a2|x)))].

The above said that the BT reward objective for r is also the value of the DPO objective for πr∗. Now let’s consider the following two cases:
上述内容表明，对于 r 的 BT 奖励目标也是对于 πr∗ 的 DPO 目标的价值。现在让我们考虑以下两种情况：

  1. r is optimal for Bradley-Terry
    r 对 Bradley-Terry 模型来说是最优的

πr∗ is then optimal for the RLHF objective. Suppose that πr∗ is suboptimal for the DPO objective, then there must exist another policy π′ such that π′ obtains a strictly lower DPO loss. A following deduction is the existence of another r′ such that π′=πr′∗ and this r′ obtains a lower BT loss than r, which yield a contradiction to that r is optimal.
πr∗ 对于 RLHF 目标是最优的。假设 πr∗ 对于 DPO 目标是次优的，那么一定存在另一个策略 π′ ，使得 π′ 获得严格更低的 DPO 损失。接下来的推论是存在另一个 r′ ，使得 π′=πr′∗ 并且这个 r′ 获得比 r 更低的 BT 损失，这与 r 是最优的这一说法产生矛盾。

  1. π∗ is optimal for DPO
    π∗ 对 DPO 是最优的

It is then straightforward to see that the corresponding r≜ηlog⁡π∗(a|x)πref(a|x) must be optimal for the BT model, thus the corresponding optimum to RLHF is then π(a|x)∝πref(a|x)exp⁡(η−1⋅η⋅log⁡π∗(a|x)πref(a|x))=π∗(a|x).
很容易看出，相应的 r≜ηlog⁡π∗(a|x)πref(a|x) 对于 BT 模型必须是最优的，因此对于 RLHF 相应的最优值是 π(a|x)∝πref(a|x)exp⁡(η−1⋅η⋅log⁡π∗(a|x)πref(a|x))=π∗(a|x) 。

Therefore, the solutions to DPO and RLHF objective functions are identical, as stated by Proposition 2. We mention in passing that it is possible to extend pairwise ranking to k-wise.
因此，如命题 2 所述，DPO 和 RLHF 目标函数的解是相同的。顺便提一下，将成对排名扩展到 k 元排名是可能的。

Illustration of the DPO Algorithms

DPO 算法的阐述

Following our defintions of online/offline learning given in Section 1.3, the DPO algorithm can be implemented in both offline (also off-policy) and online (also on-policy) fashions.
根据我们在第 1.3 节中给出的在线/离线学习的定义，DPO 算法可以以离线（也称为非策略）和在线（也称为策略）的方式实现。

  1. Offline DPO by Rafailov et al. (2023)
    拉菲洛夫等人（2023）的离线DPO（Offline DPO）

The vanilla/offline DPO directly optimize the LLM policies on a given set of preference data, D={(x,a+,a−)}, where the responses were sampled from inaccessible LLMs and the preferences over them were annotated by either humans (e.g. the [HH](https://github.com/anthropics/hh-rlhf) dataset from Anthropic) or AIs (e.g. the [UltraChat](https://github.com/thunlp/UltraChat) dataset from Tsinghua University).
vanilla/offline DPO 直接在给定的一组偏好数据 D={(x,a+,a−)} 上优化 LLM 策略，其中响应是从无法访问的 LLMs 中采样的，并且对它们的偏好是由人类（例如来自 Anthropic 的 [HH](https://github.com/anthropics/hh-rlhf) 数据集）或 AI（例如来自清华大学的 [UltraChat](https://github.com/thunlp/UltraChat) 数据集）标注的。

The process of such offline DPO can be described as:
这种离线 DPO 的过程可描述为：

(15)for  (x,a+,a−)  in  D: update θt by loss ℓDPO(θt)≜log⁡σ[ηlog⁡πθ(a+|x)π0(a+|x)−ηlog⁡πθ(a−|x)π0(a−|x)] t=t+1

Compared with RLHF, the above offline DPO objective function leads to more stable learning, and easier hyperparameter tuning.
与 RLHF 相比，上述离线 DPO 目标函数会导致更稳定的学习以及更轻松的超参数调整。

  1. Online DPO by Guo et al. (2024)
    郭等人（2024）的在线DPO（Online DPO）

Despite the advantages of offline DPO, it suffers from a significant distribution shift from D to πθt (the policy being trained) as we illustrated before. In the meantime, the derivation of DPO’s objective function also requires on-policy samples. Thus, Guo et al. (2024) proposed the online version of DPO to avoid the shift problem, and the outline is described below:
尽管离线 DPO 具有优势，但正如我们之前所说明的，它存在从 D 到 πθt （正在训练的策略）有显著的分布偏移。同时，DPO 目标函数的推导也需要on-policy样本。因此，Guo 等人（2024 年）提出了 DPO 的在线版本以避免偏移问题，其大纲如下：

(16)for x in  D:sample two responsesa1,a2∼πθt(⋅|x)annotate them by either human or AI lablers to get a+,a−update θt by loss ℓDPO(θt)≜log⁡σ[ηlog⁡πθ(a+|x)π0(a+|x)−ηlog⁡πθ(a−|x)π0(a−|x)] t=t+1

In offline DPO, all responses were sampled and annotated at once, the frequency of sampling from the policy being trained is 0 over training. On the other hand, in online DPO, all responses are samples in a batch-wise way, and the frequency of sampling is 1/batch.
在离线 DPO 中，所有响应一次性进行采样和标注，在训练过程中从正在训练的策略中进行采样的频率为 0。另一方面，在在线 DPO 中，所有响应以批量方式进行采样，采样频率为 1/batch。

  1. Iterative DPO:
    迭代式DPO：

Beyond the these two extreme cases, a natural trade-off between them is the iterative DPO introduced by Xiong et al. (2023) and Xu et al. (2023) concurrently, where the sampling frequency is between 0 and 1 per batch. Its process can be described as:
除了这两种极端情况之外，熊等人（2023 年）和徐等人（2023 年）同时提出的迭代 DPO 是它们之间的一种自然权衡，其中每批的采样频率在 0 到 1 之间。其过程可描述为：

(17)Initialize D=Doff;for t = 1,2,3,...train πt from π0 using DPO and with D;use two exploration policies (π~t1,π~t2) to collect m response pairs;ask human or AI labeler to label the preference signal to get Dt;D←D∪Dt

Compared to the online version, the iterative version can be viewed as a trade-off between sampling frequency and training efficiency. Another distinct feature is that the authors stress the importance of exploration, summarized in their choices of exploration policies (π~t1,π~t2) . The optimal choices of the exploration policy depend on the uncertainty in the sequential decision making, which may not easily be computed in practice (see theoretical explanation here). However, the theoretical insights should at least motivate the algorithmic design in principle:
与在线版本相比，迭代版本可被视为在采样频率和训练效率之间的一种权衡。另一个显著特征是，作者强调了探索的重要性，这体现在他们对探索策略 (π~t1,π~t2) 的选择中。探索策略的最优选择取决于顺序决策中的不确定性，而这在实践中可能不容易计算（此处见理论解释）。然而，理论见解至少应在原则上推动算法设计：

  • Xiong et al. (2023) proves that when the offline dataset is diverse enough (diversity is not identical to the quality), (π0,πt) is sufficient;
    熊等（2023）证明，当离线数据集足够多样化时（多样性与质量并不相同）， (π0,πt) 是足够的；

  • Otherwise, we may choose policies ``around'' πt to exploit the information behind the collected data so far, but in the meantime, maximize their differences to facilitate exploration.
    否则，我们可能会选择围绕 πt 的策略，以利用到目前为止收集的数据背后的信息，但同时，使它们的差异最大化以促进探索。

    • LLaMA2 and Claude choose to use model variants in different training steps and with different temperatures;
      LLaMA2 和 Claude 选择在不同的训练步骤中使用不同的模型变体以及不同的温度；

    • Xu et al. (2023) and Snorker-AI-DPO propose to use rejection sampling: we independently sample 4 responses for each prompt, ask the oracle to rank them, and take the best v.s. the worst.
      徐等人（2023 年）和 Snorker - AI - DPO 提议使用拒绝采样：我们为每个prompt独立采样 4 个响应，让oracle对它们进行排名，并取最好的与最差的进行比较。

The design of exploration policy is still largely under-explored, only with some initial work. There is also a line of works considering active learning. See this subsection for a discussion of different exploration policy choices and theoretical insights behind them.
exploration policy的设计在很大程度上仍未得到充分探索，仅有一些初步工作。还有一系列工作考虑了主动学习。关于不同探索策略选择及其背后的理论见解的讨论，请参见本小节。

Something about Offline DPO that is not well understood today

当今对离线数据处理操作（Offline DPO）存在一些未被充分理解的方面

It has been observed by serveral groups of researchers that both log⁡π(a+|x) and log⁡π(a−|x) decreased over the offline DPO training. Below, we show the Wandb log of the official DPO implementation.
几组研究人员观察到，在离线 DPO 训练过程中， log⁡π(a+|x) 和 log⁡π(a−|x) 均有所下降。下面，我们展示官方 DPO 实现的 Wandb 日志。

The behaviors of policies in the above diagram is counterintuitive: a+ has lower probability conditioned on x than a− after the DPO training. This weird phenomenon has been observed since August of 2023, but there is no reasonable explanation so far. In the meantime, whether online DPO has the same problem is unknown.
上述图表中policy的行为违反直觉：在 DPO 训练后，以 x 为prompt， a+ 的概率低于 a− 。自 2023 年 8 月以来，已观察到这种奇怪的现象，但到目前为止尚无合理的解释。同时，在线 DPO 是否存在相同的问题尚不清楚。

Our guess is that, it might be easier for the models to decrease both π(a+|x) and π(a−|x) as they have too low likelihood under π(⋅|x). Suppose this is true, online DPO should then increase π(a+|x) and decrease π(a−|x) as they are both from the mode of π(⋅|x). But, we didn’t run any experiment to verify it, so we’d like to leave this just as a hypothesis. Feel free to contact us if you want to dig into this problem! We’re very insterested in the answer for it!
我们的猜测是，对于模型来说，降低 π(a+|x) 和 π(a−|x) 可能更容易，因为它们在 π(⋅|x) 下的可能性过低。假设这是真的，那么在线 DPO 应该增加 π(a+|x) 并降低 π(a−|x) ，因为它们都来自 π(⋅|x) 的模式。但是，我们没有进行任何实验来验证它，所以我们想将其仅作为一个假设。如果您想深入研究这个问题，请随时与我们联系！我们对这个问题的答案非常感兴趣！

Verbosity Bias of DPO and Other Alignment Algorithms
DPO 及其他对齐算法的冗长性偏差

The DPO-aligned models tend to generate much longer responses than the SFT model, and the bias is further amplified during the iteration process even though the reward model does not explicitly bias toward the longer responses. As a case study, we use the reward model weqweasdas/RM-Mistral-7B to label the responses and use the SFT checkpoint HuggingFaceH4/mistral-7b-sft-beta. Then, we observe that the resulting model aligned by (iterative) DPO and RAFT is more than twice as long as the SFT model. On the other hand, we compute the pearson correlation coefficient for each prompt, group the prompts according to the average response length, and plot the heat map as follows.
与 SFT 模型相比，与 DPO 对齐的模型往往会生成长得多的响应，并且即使奖励模型并未明确偏向较长的响应，在迭代过程中这种偏差也会进一步放大。作为案例研究，我们使用奖励模型 weqweasdas/RM-Mistral-7B 来标记响应，并使用 SFT 检查点 HuggingFaceH4/mistral -7b-sft-beta。然后，我们观察到通过（迭代）DPO 和 RAFT 对齐得到的模型比 SFT 模型的长度长两倍以上。另一方面，我们为每个prompt计算皮尔逊相关系数，根据平均响应长度对prompt进行分组，并绘制如下热图。

Heat map of the x: per-prompt pearson correlation coefficient between the response length and reward; y: the number of prompts.
x：响应长度和奖励之间的每个prompt的皮尔逊相关系数的热图；y：prompt的数量。

To some extent, the reward model may prefer the shorter responses or at least does not explicitly prefer the longer responses. However, the resulting models generate much longer responses compared to the SFT models. This is also related to the observations of likelihood decreasing in DPO training. We plot the density ratio πt(⋅|x)/πt(⋅|x) on the training set as follows.
在某种程度上，奖励模型可能倾向于较短的响应，或者至少没有明确倾向于较长的响应。然而，与 SFT 模型相比，所得到的模型会生成长得多的响应。这也与在 DPO 训练中观察到的似然性降低有关。我们如下在训练集上绘制密度比 πt(⋅|x)/πt(⋅|x) 。

The density ratio (1000 pairs) between the DPO-aligned model (HuggingFaceH4/zephyr-7b-beta) and SFT model
DPO 对齐模型（HuggingFaceH4/zephyr - 7b - beta）与 SFT 模型之间的密度比（1000 对）

As we can see, the average likelihood of both chosen response and rejected response decrease, but the short responses contribute most to this phenomena. On the other hand, the long responses are much stable in the likelihood.
如我们所见，所选回答和被拒回答的平均可能性均降低，但简短回答对此现象的影响最大。另一方面，长回答在可能性方面要稳定得多。

Therefore, the verbosity issue may be related more to the algorithmic design. Instead of trying to eliminating the length bias in the data or reward, we guess that we may need to explicitly handle this issue in the algorithmic design or modify the preference signal to encourage short responses given similar qualities.
因此，冗长问题可能更多地与算法设计相关。我们猜测，与其试图消除数据或奖励中的长度偏差，我们可能需要在算法设计中明确处理此问题，或修改偏好信号，以在质量相似的情况下鼓励简短的回应。

3.2 Identity-preference Optimization (IPO)

3.2 身份偏好优化（IPO）

A significant limitation of the DPO objective is that it still assumes the BT model to substitute the pairwise preferences by point-wise rewards. To address this limitation, Azar et al. (2023) then introduced Φ-preference optimization (ΦPO).
DPO 目标的一个显著局限性在于，它仍然假定 BT 模型用逐点奖励来替代成对偏好。为了解决这一局限性，Azar 等人（2023）随后引入了 Φ -偏好优化（ ΦPO ）。

Connection between Φ-mapping and the BT model
Φ -映射与 BT 模型之间的联系

Azar et al. (2023) defines Φ as a general non-decreasing function that maps from [0,1] to R. Thus, the BT model is actually a special case of it, and can be defined as Φ(P)=log⁡P1−P. Check out their paper if you’re interested about why this is the case.
阿扎尔等人（2023 年）将 Φ 定义为从 [0,1] 到 R 的一个一般的非递减函数。因此，BT 模型实际上是它的一个特殊情况，可以定义为 Φ(P)=log⁡P1−P 。如果您有兴趣了解为什么会这样，可以查看他们的论文。

Problem of the BT model (particularly in DPO)
BT model的问题（特别是在DPO中）

Below, we plot the curve of the function f(P)=log⁡P1−P. As can be seen, with the BT model, when P(a+≻a−|x)=1, we have f(P)=r(x,a+)−r(x,a−)→+∞, thus π∗(a−|x)π∗(a+|x)=0 despite however strong regularization. As claimed by Azar et al. (2023) , this issue is not too significant in RLHF, as the reward models usually underfit on the preference dataset, thus RLHF yields a final policy that is sufficiently regularized towards the reference policy. However, as DPO deosn’t train a reward model, the regularization from the underfitted reward model is then lost.
下面，我们绘制函数 f(P)=log⁡P1−P 的曲线。可以看出，使用 BT 模型，当 P(a+≻a−|x)=1 时，我们有 f(P)=r(x,a+)−r(x,a−)→+∞ ，因此 π∗(a−|x)π∗(a+|x)=0 ，无论正则化有多强。正如 Azar 等人（2023 年）所声称的，这个问题在 RLHF 中不太显著，因为奖励模型通常在偏好数据集上欠拟合，因此 RLHF 产生的最终策略对参考策略进行了充分的正则化。然而，由于 DPO 没有训练奖励模型，因此来自欠拟合奖励模型的正则化就丢失了。

IPO: Preference Optimization with Identity Mapping
IPO：具有身份映射的偏好优化

The solution from the IPO paper to the above problem is simple and straightforward: replacing the Φ(P)=log⁡P1−P mapping function for the BT model by an identity mapping function Φ(P)=P.
IPO 论文中针对上述问题的solution简单明了：将 BT 模型的 Φ(P)=log⁡P1−P 映射函数替换为恒等映射函数 Φ(P)=P 。

We hereby skip the long derivation of the empirical IPO loss function, and simply write it down following our notations:
在此，我们略过对经验性IPO损失函数的冗长推导，仅根据我们的符号将其写下：

(18)ℓIPO(θ)=∑(x,a+,a−)[log⁡[πθ(a+|x)π0(a−|x)πθ(a−|x)π0(a+|x)]−12η]2

3.3 Sequence Likelihood Calibration (SLiC)

3.3 序列似然校准（SLiC）

Unlike the DPO and IPO objectives, the core idea of SLiC is to calibrate the likelihood of ranked sequences sampled from the policy being trained. On human preference data, one way to implement the SLiC loss function is given below:
与 DPO 和 IPO 目标不同，SLiC 的核心思想是校准从正在训练的策略中采样的排名序列的可能性。在人类偏好数据上，实现 SLiC 损失函数的一种方法如下：

(19)ℓSLiC(θ)=∑x,a+,a−max[0,δ−log⁡πθ(a+|x)+log⁡πθ(a−|x)]−η⋅log⁡πθ(aref|x).

Intuitively, the above SLiC loss function can be decomposed into two parts:
直观地讲，上述 SLiC 损失函数可分解为两部分：

  1. Rank function: this is to guarantee that the difference between log⁡πθ(a+|x) and log⁡πθ(a−|x) is greater than δ under the current policy πθ.
    秩函数：这是为了确保在当前policy πθ 下， log⁡πθ(a+|x) 和 log⁡πθ(a−|x) 之间的差值大于 δ 。

  2. Cross-entropy regularizer: the second part of the SLiC loss is to encourage the model to stay close to the SFT model π0 by decreasing the NLL of aref. This is no π0 in this part, since aref can be sampled from π0.
    交叉熵正则化器：SLiC 损失的第二部分是通过降低 aref 的负对数似然（NLL）来鼓励模型接近 SFT 模型 π0 。在这部分中不存在 π0 ，因为 aref 可以从 π0 中采样得到。

Other possible choices of ranking function and regularizers have also been discussed by Zhao et al. (2023) in their paper. Check out their paper, if you are interested in more details.
赵等人（2023 年）在他们的论文中还讨论了排名函数和正则化器的其他可能选择。如果您对更多细节感兴趣，可以查看他们的论文。

3.4 Comparison between DPO, IPO and SLiC

3.4 DPO、IPO 与 SLiC 之间的比较

One natural question after reading through the above content about DPO, IPO and SLiC could be: which one among the three algorithms performs the best? Before we discuss their empirical performances, we can see that they can be viewed as different choices of loss functions: if we denote ρθ=log⁡πθ(a+|x)π0(a+|x)−log⁡πθ(a−|x)π0(a−|x), then
读完上述有关 DPO、IPO 和 SLiC 的内容后，一个自然的问题可能是：这三种算法中哪一种表现最佳？在我们讨论它们的经验性能之前，我们可以看到它们可以被视为不同的损失函数选择：如果我们表示为 ρθ=log⁡πθ(a+|x)π0(a+|x)−log⁡πθ(a−|x)π0(a−|x) ，那么

Table from Generalized Preference Optimization: A Unified Approach to Offline Alignment
来自《广义偏好优化：离线对齐的统一方法》中的表格

Guo et al. (2024) compared different algorithms with their online variants with identical online AI labeller to annotate preferences, and the results evaluated by human raters are given below.
郭等人（2024 年）将不同算法与其具有相同online AI labeller的在线变体进行比较，以标注偏好，由人类评估者评估的结果如下。

As can be seen, the outputs from onlind DPO/IPO/SLiC are preferred at 26%/25%/22% of the time against each other, whereas around 27% of the time they tie. The results basically confirmed that there is no significant difference between the performance of the online version of all these algorithms.
可以看出，在线 DPO/IPO/SLiC 的输出结果相互比较时，分别有 26%/25%/22%的时间更受青睐，而约 27%的时间它们不分胜负。结果基本证实，所有这些算法的在线版本的性能之间没有显著差异。

A similar experiment has been carried out by the Huggingface H4 team in an offline fashion, and their results (given below) show that offline IPO outperformed offline DPO and offline KTO (which hasn’t been introduced yet) for most of the beta (eta in this blog) values.
Huggingface H4 团队以离线方式进行了一项类似的实验，他们的结果（如下所示）表明，对于大多数β值（本博客中为η值），离线 IPO 的表现优于离线 DPO 和尚未介绍的离线 KTO。

3.5 Rejection Sampling in RLHF

3.5 在 RLHF 中的拒绝采样

Rejection sampling is a widely utilized method in Monte Carlo tasks, which is designed to approximate a target distribution q by sampling from a proposal distribution p. The efficiency of this process mainly depends on the density ratio
拒绝采样是蒙特卡罗任务中广泛使用的一种方法，旨在通过从proposal distribution p 中采样来近似目标分布 q 。此过程的效率主要取决于密度比

(20)supxq(x)p(x)≤M.

We first draw n samples from the proposal distribution p, where each of the same is accepted with a probability r=q(x)Mp(x). Then, the accepted samples x~ are representative of the target distribution q. For instance, the q may be the πr for some learned reward and p can be the π0. In this case,
我们首先从提议分布 p 中抽取 n 个样本，其中每个样本以概率 r=q(x)Mp(x) 被接受。然后，被接受的样本 x~ 代表目标分布 q 。例如， q 可能是针对某些学习奖励的 πr ，而 p 可以是 π0 。在这种情况下，

(21)M=supx,aπ0(a|x)exp⁡(r(x,a)/η)/Z(x)π0(a|x)=supx,a1Z(x)exp⁡(1ηr(x,a)).

The primary challenge in rejection sampling is its low acceptance rate due to a large M. In practice, we usually use a fixed budget of n, and the number of accepted samples is set as a hyper-parameter, leading to the trade-off between approximation error and sample efficiency. There are three primary ways to use rejection sampling in RLHF.
在拒绝采样中，主要挑战是由于较大的 M 导致其接受率低。在实践中，我们通常使用固定的 n 预算，并且将接受的样本数量设置为超参数，从而在近似误差和样本效率之间进行权衡。在 RLHF 中使用拒绝采样有三种主要方式。

  • Inference-time Alignment: in this case, for each query prompt x, we simply sample n responses, and take the one with the highest reward as the final output (and reject all other samples). It is also referred to as the best-of- n policy;
    推理时间对齐：在这种情况下，对于每个查询prompt x ，我们简单地采样 n 个响应，并将奖励最高的那个作为最终输出（并拒绝所有其他样本）。它也被称为最佳的 n 策略；

  • Rejection-sampling Fine-tuning: we take one step further to fine-tune the LLM on the rejection-sampling samples, typically in an iterative manner.
    拒绝采样微调：我们更进一步，对拒绝采样样本上的LLM进行微调，通常以迭代的方式进行。

  • RS as an exploration strategy: more recently, rejection sampling is also used to collect samples for pairwise comparison. For instance, Liu et. al. proposes to use rejection sampling to generate samples for offline DPO training, while a line of works uses best-of-n policy and worst-of-n policy to construct the comparison responses in iterative DPO training.
    作为一种探索策略的拒绝采样：近来，拒绝采样也被用于收集成对比较的样本。例如，Liu 等人提议使用拒绝采样为离线 DPO 训练生成样本，而一系列工作在迭代 DPO 训练中使用最佳 - n 策略和最差 - n 策略来构建比较响应。

It is widely validated that the simple rejection-sampling fine-tuning method often attains competitive or better performance than RL approaches for LLMs, including training a helpful assistant, machine translation, mathematical reasoning, multi-turn natural language game, coding. Therefore, the rejection sampling fine-tuning or simply best-of-n inference should serve as a stable baseline for the RLHF algorithmic design.
广泛证实，对于包括训练一个有用的助手、机器翻译、数学推理、多轮自然语言游戏、编码在内的LLMs，简单的拒绝采样微调方法通常能获得与强化学习方法相当或更好的性能。因此，拒绝采样微调或简单的最佳 n 推断应作为 RLHF 算法设计的稳定基线。

On the other hand, it turns out that rejection sampling is also helpful as a heuristic exploration strategy to work in the online learning, as we have discussed previously.
另一方面，正如我们之前所讨论的，事实证明，拒绝采样作为一种启发式探索策略，对在线学习也很有帮助。

4 Miscellaneous

4 杂项

In this section, we’re going to introduce serveral topics spreading across RL-based and RL-free alignment algorithms. We didn’t find very organized way to cluster these topics, so we simply put them all together as miscellaneous issues about alignment.
在本节中，我们将介绍几个涵盖基于强化学习（RL）和非基于强化学习的对齐算法的主题。我们未找到非常有条理的方式对这些主题进行聚类，因此我们只是将它们全部归为关于对齐的杂项问题。

4.1 Reward Modeling in RLHF

4.1 在 RLHF 中的 Reward Modeling

The reward model may be largely divided into five groups.
奖励模型大致可分为五组。

  • Bradley-Terry model: the MLE of the BT model using pairwise comparisons, essentially a classification problem;
    BT模型：使用成对比较的 BT 模型的最大似然估计，本质上是一个分类问题；

  • Direct preference optimization (DPO): DPO trains the LLM as a reward, and we can use log⁡π(a|x)π0(a|x) as the reward;
    直接偏好优化（DPO）：DPO 将 LLM 作为奖励进行训练，并且我们可以将 log⁡π(a|x)π0(a|x) 作为奖励；

  • Preference model: a preference model takes a prompt and two responses as the input, and output which one is better;
    偏好模型：偏好模型将一个prompt和两个响应作为输入，并输出哪一个更好；

  • Regression-based model: the regression-based model use the absolute value as the signal to directly conduct regression for training;
    基于回归的模型：基于回归的模型将绝对值作为信号，直接进行回归以用于训练；

  • LLM-as-a-Judge: formulating the evaluation of responses as an instruction following task to the LLM.
    LLM作为评判者：将对回应的评估制定为给LLM的一项遵循指令的任务。

We refer the interested readers to the following GitHub repo for a recipe to train the state-of-the-art reward model.
我们建议感兴趣的读者参考以下 GitHub 存储库，以获取训练最先进的奖励模型的方法。

https://github.com/WeiXiongUST/RLHF-Reward-Modeling

LLM-as-a-Judge v.s. Reward Models:

LLM-as-a-Judge与奖励模型：

from an out-of-distribution generalization perspective
从分布外泛化的角度

As we mention before, RLHF suffers from distribution shift issues and the reward model often generalizes poorly to the out-of-distribution samples (especially the samples with high rewards). Therefore, one important message is that the reward model is accurate only locally. In other words, accuracy is a rather limited metric. Another important metric to evaluate the qualify of a reward model is the robustness in the face of distribution shift, which is largely ignored previously. One thing we do know from Figure is that the larger model seems to be able to tolerate more distribution shifts.
如我们之前所述，RLHF 存在分布偏移问题，奖励模型对分布外样本（尤其是高奖励样本）的泛化能力往往较差。因此，一个重要的信息是，奖励模型仅在局部是准确的。换句话说，准确性是一个相当有限的指标。评估奖励模型质量的另一个重要指标是面对分布偏移时的鲁棒性，这在之前很大程度上被忽视了。从图中我们确实知道的一件事是，较大的模型似乎能够容忍更多的分布偏移。

💡 As shown by Wang et al. (2024), a linear transformation of reward scores, e.g. r~(x,y)=r(x,y)+C(x) where C(x):X↦R, doesn’t change the results of Bradley-Terry model.
💡正如王等人（2024 年）所示，对奖励分数进行线性变换，例如 r~(x,y)=r(x,y)+C(x) （其中 C(x):X↦R ），不会改变BT模型的结果。

On the other hand, LLMs are known to have superior out-of-distribution generalization performance, thus they can alleviate the out-of-distribution issues of reward models. As discussed by Lee et al. (2023), LLMs yield more effective reward scores for RLHF, compared with reward models of the same size. In the meantime, instead of getting reward scores from LLMs, Guo et al. (2024) show that LLMs also yield effective preferences for RL-free methods. Moreover, they also show that feedback from smaller LLMs can indeed improve the alignment of larger LLMs, which paves a parrallel way to achieve weak-to-strong alignemnt other than the one from OpenAI.
另一方面，已知LLMs具有卓越的分布外泛化性能，因此它们可以缓解奖励模型的分布外问题。正如 Lee 等人（2023 年）所讨论的，与相同规模的奖励模型相比，LLMs为 RLHF 产生更有效的奖励分数。同时，郭等人（2024 年）表明，不是从LLMs获得奖励分数，LLMs也为无 RL 方法产生有效的偏好。此外，他们还表明，来自较小的LLMs的反馈确实可以改善较大的LLMs的对齐，这为实现从弱到强的对齐开辟了一条与 OpenAI 不同的平行途径。

In the recently released RewardBench, the first author has also compared GPT-4 with RMs of varying size, and pointed out the superiority of GPT-4. The results from the first author’s X post are given below.
在最近发布的 RewardBench 中，第一作者还将 GPT - 4 与不同规模的 RM 进行了比较，并指出了 GPT - 4 的优越性。第一作者的 X 帖中的结果如下所示。

ModelChat
聊天		Chat Hard

安全		Reasoning

GPT-4 涡轮增压版		95748787
