最佳 RM		97599090

Scaling Law of RM v.s. KL

RM 与 KL 的标度律

Since the reward models generlize porrly on out-of-distribution samples, a natural question is about how well reward models can generalize to different policies where the difference can be measured by KL-divergence. This motivates the need of a new kind of scaling law for reward models, where the x-axis is the size of reward models, and the y-axis is the farthest accurate KL divergence of them. The farthest accurate KL divergence of a reward model r is defined as the maxmal KL divergence between the policy being trained π and the reference policy πref such that the expected accuracy of preference by scores from r is higher than a given thredshold. As the agreement degree between human labellers is usualy 70%, a reasonable thredshold could be 75%.
由于奖励模型在分布外样本上的泛化能力较差，一个自然的问题是奖励模型对不同策略的泛化能力如何，其中差异可以通过 KL 散度来衡量。这就促使需要一种新的奖励模型缩放定律，其中 x 轴是奖励模型的大小，y 轴是它们最远的准确 KL 散度。奖励模型 r 的最远准确 KL 散度被定义为正在训练的策略 π 和参考策略 πref 之间的最大 KL 散度，使得来自 r 的分数的偏好预期准确率高于给定阈值。由于人类标注者之间的一致程度通常为 70％，合理的阈值可以是 75％。

A sketch of the scaling law illustrated above is given below.
上面所示的标度律的示意图在下面给出。

With a scaling law like this, we can easily tell whether a new reward model needs to be trained over the RL training of RLHF, as KL divergence from πt to the initial model can be easily tracked.
有了这样的缩放定律，我们可以很容易地判断在 RLHF 的 RL 训练中是否需要训练新的奖励模型，因为从 πt 到初始模型的 KL 散度可以很容易地跟踪。

4.2 Evaluation in RLHF

4.2 在强化学习人类反馈（Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback）中的评估

Due to the distribution shift issue, the reward value is an unreliable metric to measure the performance of the aligned models. On the other hand, the human preference signals are expensive and slow to collect. In view of this, researchers have designed various benchmarks to fill this gap, where a popular way is to use the strong LLMs (like GPT4, Claude) to approximate human. Popular benchmarks focusing on helpfulness (instruction-following capabilities) include
由于分布偏移问题，奖励值是衡量对齐模型性能的一个不可靠指标。另一方面，人类偏好信号的收集成本高昂且速度缓慢。鉴于此，研究人员设计了各种基准来填补这一空白，其中一种常见的方法是使用强大的LLMs（如 GPT4、Claude）来近似人类。关注有用性（指令遵循能力）的常见基准包括

  • Chatbot Arena:
    **聊天机器人竞技场：

    • Human asks any question to two anonymous models;
      人类向两个匿名模型提出任何问题；

    • The models give responses;
      模型给出响应；

    • Human identify the winner.
      人类确定获胜者。

  • MT bench is a set of 80 multi-turn question in Writing, Roleplay, Extraction, Reasoning, Math, Coding, Knowledge I (STEM), and Knowledge II (humanities/social science), and each category consists of 10 questions.
    MT 测试台是一组包含写作、角色扮演、提取、推理、数学、编码、知识 I（STEM）和知识 II（人文/社会科学）的 80 道多轮问题，并且每个类别包含 10 个问题。

    • GPT4 is used to give an absolute score in [1, 10] to evaluate each response.
      GPT4 被用于在 [1, 10] 范围内给出一个绝对分数，以评估每个响应。

❗ A practical problem of using GPT4 as the evaluator for MT Bench is that LLMs may raise inconsistent evaluations. We tried to switch GPT-4 to Claude-3, and found that the agreement between the two models is quite low.
❗将 GPT4 用作 MT Bench 评估器的一个实际问题是LLMs可能会引起不一致的评估。我们尝试将 GPT - 4 切换为 Claude - 3，发现这两个模型之间的一致性相当低。

  • Alpaca Eval: the model is deployed to compete with the GPT4-Turbo, where the GPT4-Turbo is also used to conduct pairwise comparison and reports win rate. The benchmark was initially designed for measure the instruction-following ability of the model.
    羊驼评估：该模型被部署以与 GPT4-Turbo 竞争，其中 GPT4-Turbo 也被用于进行成对比较并报告胜率。该基准最初是为了衡量模型的指令遵循能力而设计的。

💡 Following the objective of aligning LLMs, we hereby emphasize that both MT bench and Alpaca Eval focus more on the instruction-following ability of LLMs rather than the aligned behaviours of LLMs. Considering the “alignment tax” investigated by Anthropic in their HH paper, alignment algorithms may not be able to improve the performance of <10B LLMs on following users’ instructions. Therefore, MT bench and Alpaca Eval might not be fully suitable for a comprehensive evaluation of alignment. Moreover, alignment is orthogonal to the instruction-following ability: a powerful LLM might be very helpful but rude at the same time, while a weak LLM might behave friendly but is not so useful.
💡 为了实现与LLMs保持一致的目标，我们在此强调，MT 基准和 Alpaca Eval 更关注LLMs的指令遵循能力，而非LLMs的对齐行为。考虑到 Anthropic 在其 HH 论文中研究的“对齐成本”，对齐算法可能无法提高<10B LLMs在遵循用户指令方面的性能。因此，MT 基准和 Alpaca Eval 可能并不完全适用于对对齐的全面评估。此外，对齐与指令遵循能力是正交的：一个强大的LLM可能非常有帮助，但同时可能很粗鲁，而一个弱小的LLM可能表现得友好，但并不是那么有用。

The benchmark for other objectives include
其他目标的基准包括

  • PKU-SafeRLHF for safety;
    PKU-SafeRLHF 以实现安全性；

  • HELM Instruct: a multi-objective benchmark with absolute scores.
    HELM 指令：具有绝对分数的多目标基准。

However, it is also known that the LLM suffers from the following limitations:
然而，众所周知，LLM存在以下局限性：

  • The evaluation prompt set may not be representative enough to capture the real-world usage;
    评估prompt集可能不足以具有代表性来捕捉现实世界的使用情况；

  • Position/verbosity/.. bias: LLM may favor lengthier answers, regardless of their quality, favor the first answer in the pairwise comparison, and favor responses containing lists. There is also a work from Li et al. (2023) paving towards a solution to the lengthy bias. Check out Zongjie’s comment for more details!
    位置/冗长性/.. 偏见：LLM 可能倾向于更长的答案，而不论其质量如何，在成对比较中倾向于第一个答案，并倾向于包含列表的回答。还有李等人（2023 年）的一项工作为解决冗长偏见铺平了道路。查看 Zongjie 的评论以了解更多详细信息！

  • Self-enhancement bias: LLM may favor their own responses or responses from similar models;
    自我增强偏差：LLM可能会偏爱他们自己的反应或来自类似模型的反应；

  • Limited reasoning ability: LLM may be inadequate in math and reasoning questions.
    有限的推理能力：LLM在数学和推理问题上可能存在不足。

4.3 Theoretical Understanding of RLHF

4.3 对 RLHF 的理论理解

The theoretical understanding of preference learning can date back to the dueling bandit, where the agent learns from relative preference feedback, instead of absolute reward value as the standard bandit or RL theory literature. Since then, extensive studies have been conducted to understand the learnability of the RLHF in either bandit or MDP scenario. However, all these works focus on the reward maximization only, and chase for the greedy and deterministic policy induced by the reward function, thus deviating from the practical applications. Inspired by the practice, the RLHF can be formulated as a reverse-KL regularized contextual bandit, consistent with the practical applications, in offline, online, and hybrid setting. Before continuing to introduce the theoretical framework and results, we first assume the following computational oracle, which can be reasonably approximated by many practical algorithms like PPO, DPO, SLIC, and IPO mentioned before.
对偏好学习的理论理解可追溯到决斗强盗模型，在该模型中，智能体从相对偏好反馈中学习，而非像标准强盗模型或强化学习理论文献中那样从绝对奖励值中学习。从那时起，人们进行了广泛的研究，以了解强化学习人类反馈（RLHF）在强盗模型或马尔可夫决策过程（MDP）场景中的可学习性。然而，所有这些工作都只关注奖励最大化，并追求由奖励函数诱导的贪婪和确定性策略，从而偏离了实际应用。受实践的启发，RLHF 可以被表述为一种反向 KL 正则化上下文强盗模型，与实际应用一致，适用于离线、在线和混合设置。在继续介绍理论框架和结果之前，我们首先假设以下计算预言机，它可以通过许多实际算法（如前面提到的 PPO、DPO、SLIC 和 IPO）进行合理近似。

Computational Oracle: for any given reward r, we assume that we can approximate πr,η:=O(r,π0,η).
计算oracle：对于任何给定的奖励 r ，我们假定我们可以近似 πr,η:=O(r,π0,η).

Linear Reward Space: we assume that r∗(x,a)=ϕ(x,a)⊤θ∗, where ϕ:(x,a)→Rd is a feature map.
线性奖励空间：我们假设 r∗(x,a)=ϕ(x,a)⊤θ∗ ，其中 ϕ:(x,a)→Rd 是一个特征映射。

Offline learning with conservative reward is efficient:
离线学习搭配保守奖励是高效的：

The first setting is the offline setting, where we can only learn from an offline dataset D={(xi,ai1,ai2,yi)}i=1n without further querying P. If we take the following policy:
第一种设置是离线设置，在此设置中，我们只能从离线数据集 D={(xi,ai1,ai2,yi)}i=1n 中学习，而不能进一步查询 P 。如果我们采取以下策略：

(22)π^=O(rMLE−c⋅d∥ϕ(x,a)−Ex∼d0,a∼π0ϕ(x,a)∥Σn−1⏟Lower confidence bound of r∗,π0,η)

where the high-level idea is to use a conservative reward model because the reward estimator is always a lower confidence bound of the r∗**.** Here Σn−1 denotes the covariance matrix estimated on the offline dataset:
其中，高级理念是使用保守的奖励模型，因为奖励估计器始终是 r∗ 的较低置信下界。这里 Σn−1 表示在离线数据集上估计的协方差矩阵：

(23)Σn−1=λI+∑(x,a1,a2)∈D(ϕ(x,a1)−ϕ(x,a2))(ϕ(x,a1)−ϕ(x,a2))⊤

Here the Ex∼d0,a∼π0ϕ(x,a) serves as the reference vector because due to the preference learning nature, we can only evaluate the uncertainty for a pair of samples. In practice, we should use a estimated version from the samples to replace the expected one.
在这里， Ex∼d0,a∼π0ϕ(x,a) 用作参考向量，因为由于偏好学习的性质，我们只能针对一对样本评估不确定性。在实践中，我们应该使用从样本中估计出的版本来代替预期的版本。

The ideal case will be the feature difference (ϕ(x,a1)−ϕ(x,a2)) can span the whole space, calling for a diverce output distribution. Then, we have the following result.
理想情况是特征差异 (ϕ(x,a1)−ϕ(x,a2)) 能够涵盖整个空间，这需要多样化的输出分布。然后，我们得到以下结果。

Theorem 1 With high probability, for any policy π, we have
定理 1 大概率地，对于任何策略 π ，我们有

(24)η⋅Ex∼d0[KL(π(⋅|x)∥π^(⋅|x))]+J(π)−J(π^)≲dEx∼d0,a∼π∥ϕ(x,a)−Ex∼d0,a∼π0ϕ(x,a)∥Σn−1.

When the offline dataset (summarized by Σn−1) offers a good coverage for (π−π0), both the KL divergence and the value converge. This is summarized by the following coverage assumption on the preference dataset:
当离线数据集（由 Σn−1 总结）为 (π−π0) 提供良好的覆盖时，KL 散度和值都会收敛。这在关于偏好数据集的以下覆盖假设中进行了总结：

(25)Ex∼d0,a∼π∥ϕ(x,a)−Ea∼π0ϕ(x,a)∥Σn−1≤1nCcov(π),

where the Ccov(π) measures how well the preference dataset cover the target (π−π0), and in the finite sample case, this can be related to the density ratio between the distirbutions.
其中 Ccov(π) 衡量偏好数据集对目标 (π−π0) 的覆盖程度如何，在有限样本的情况下，这可能与分布之间的密度比有关。

Note that π can be arbitrary, meaning that we may not converge to the optimal policy, but as long as our dataset can cover some good policy, we can compete with it. Unfortunately, due to the large distribution shift in practice, we may not expect that the offline dataset can provide a good coverage (see Section 2.1 for the discussion). This motivates us to consider the following online iterative learning.
请注意， π 可以是任意的，这意味着我们可能无法收敛到最优策略，但只要我们的数据集能够涵盖一些好的策略，我们就可以与之竞争。不幸的是，由于在实践中存在较大的分布偏移，我们可能无法期望离线数据集能够提供良好的覆盖（有关讨论见第 2.1 节）。这促使我们考虑以下在线迭代学习。

Preference learning benefits from online exploration:
偏好学习受益于在线探索：

the second setting is the online iterative setting, where we can query the human preference oracle during the training. We focus on the iterative setting where we update the policies every m steps (the batch size) for a sparse update. If we take the exploration policies as
第二种设置是在线迭代设置，在此设置中，我们可以在训练期间查询人类偏好预言机。我们专注于迭代设置，在此设置中，我们每隔 m 步（批量大小）更新策略以进行稀疏更新。如果我们将探索策略视为

(26)(π~t1,π~t2)=(πt,π0)

then the iterative DPO introduced in Section 3 has the following theoretical guarantee.
那么，在第 3 节中介绍的迭代 DPO 具有以下理论保证。

Theorem 2 With a batch size m, after at most T=O~(d) iterations, with high probability, we can find a good policy such that
定理 2 对于批量大小 m ，在至多 T=O~(d) 次迭代后，很有可能我们可以找到一个好的策略，使得

(27)η⋅Ex∼d0[KL(π∗(⋅|x)∥π^(⋅|x))]+J(π∗)−J(π^)≲dγ2m+β∥Ex∼d0[ϕ(x,π∗)−ϕ(x,π0)∥Σoff+online−1.

Faster convergence rate: the difference between Theorem 1 and Theorem 2 is that part of the data is now collected from online exploration. In this case, we expect the coverage coefficient can be largely improved for most of the average instances. This is because, in the coverage target is the feature difference
更快的收敛速度：定理 1 和定理 2 的区别在于现在部分数据是从在线探索中收集的。在这种情况下，我们期望对于大多数平均实例，覆盖系数可以在很大程度上得到提高。这是因为，在覆盖目标中是特征差异

(28)ϕ(x,π∗)−ϕ(x,π0)

and the online data is collect by (πt,π0) , under the assumption that the offline dataset is diverse enough so that πt→π∗, the distribution shift between the online data and the coverage target gradually becomes smaller and should be able to provide a much better coverage coefficient Ccov .
并且在线数据由 (πt,π0) 收集，基于这样一个假设，即离线数据集足够多样化，以至于 πt→π∗ ，在线数据与覆盖目标之间的分布偏移逐渐变小，并且应该能够提供更好的覆盖系数 Ccov 。

Meanwhile, by choosing an optimal m the total number of preference oracle query mT=O~(d2ϵ2) matches that of sequential online setting m=1, meaning that online iterative learning with large batch size will not hurt sample efficiency compared to the sequential online setting.
同时，通过选择一个最优的 m，偏好预言机查询的总数 mT=O~(d2ϵ2) 与顺序在线设置的总数 m=1 相匹配，这意味着与顺序在线设置相比，具有大批量大小的在线迭代学习不会损害样本效率。

The design of online exploration strategies
在线探索策略的设计

One critical component in online learning is to design efficient exploration policies to effectively explore the prompt-response (state-action) space. If the offline dataset cannot provide enough coverage or we study learning from scratch, then, we must adopt some exploration strategies. In this case, we may still take πt1=πt , but modify
在线学习中的一个关键组成部分是设计有效的探索策略，以有效地探索prompt - 响应（状态 - 动作）空间。如果离线数据集不能提供足够的覆盖范围，或者我们研究从头开始学习，那么，我们必须采用一些探索策略。在这种情况下，我们可能仍然采取 πt1=πt ，但要进行修改

(29)πt2(⋅|x)=arg⁡max∥ϕ(x,πt)−ϕ(x,πt2)∥Σt,m−1

Let’s intuitively illustrate the insights behind:
让我们直观地说明其背后的见解：

  • The first agent exploits the collected samples, and choose the best-guess so far;
    第一个智能体利用收集到的样本，并选择目前为止的最佳推测；

  • The second agent tends to maximize the uncertainty of their feature difference and improve the diversity of the data collected in the online process to facilitate exploration.
    第二个代理倾向于最大化其特征差异的不确定性，并提高在线过程中收集的数据的多样性，以促进探索。

While the uncertainty quantification in general neural network remains open, our results should justify and motivate the practical algorithms at least in principle. For instance, many practical applications (Claude, and LLaMA2) found that it is crucial to use different variants of current model to collect new samples instead of one model so that we can increase the feature difference of the two policies thus maximizing the uncertainty. Some common choices to heuristically achieve the goal include
虽然一般神经网络中的不确定性量化问题仍未解决，但我们的结果至少在原则上应该为实际算法提供依据并给予动力。例如，许多实际应用（Claude 和 LLaMA2）发现，使用当前模型的不同变体来收集新样本而非仅使用一个模型至关重要，这样我们可以增加两种策略的特征差异，从而最大限度地提高不确定性。为了启发式地实现该目标，一些常见的选择包括

  • Use the variants of πt1=πt by taking the models from different training steps;
    通过从不同训练步骤中获取模型来使用 πt1=πt 的变体；

  • Use different sampling temperature.
    使用不同的采样温度。

  • We can use the rejection sampling to approximate such an exploration principle, which achieves tremendous success in snorkelai/Snorkel-Mistral-PairRM-DPO , and ranks 2nd in the Alpaca Eval leaderboard.
    我们可以使用拒绝采样来近似这样一种探索原则，该原则在 snorkelai/Snorkel-Mistral-PairRM-DPO 中取得了巨大成功，并在 Alpaca Eval 排行榜上排名第 2。

💡 Take-away messages:
💡要点：

Online/hybrid RLHF/DPO is statistically efficient as long as there are some low-rank structures in the reward space.
只要奖励空间中存在一些低秩结构，在线/混合 RLHF/DPO 在统计上是有效的。

Preference learning benefits from online explorations; with a suitable batch size, the iterative framework does not hurt the performance;
偏好学习受益于在线探索；在合适的批量大小下，迭代框架不会损害性能；

The online/hybrid framework can be implemented by replacing the information-theoretical computation oracle O with any reasonable practical offline algorithm: RLHF, DPO, SLIC, IPO…
在线/混合框架可以通过用任何合理的实际离线算法替换信息理论计算预言机 O 来实现：强化学习人类反馈（RLHF）、直接策略优化（DPO）、简单语言指令遵循（SLIC）、迭代策略优化（IPO）……

4.4 Alignment without External Preference Signals

4.4 无外部偏好信号的对齐

All we dicussed so far assume either a preference oracle or a given reward function. A natural extension is to remove this dependency on the external signals.
到目前为止我们所讨论的内容都假定要么存在偏好预言机，要么存在给定的奖励函数。一个自然的扩展方向是消除对这些外部信号的依赖。

The most straightforward way to achieve this objective is getting preference annotation from the LLM policy being trained, which has been explored by Yuan et al. (2024), and named as “self-rewarding”. Briefly, the core idea is similar to online DPO with LLM-as-a-judge, but gets preferences over responses not from an external LLM but instead the policy being trained. The algorithm is summarized below:
实现此目标的最直接方法是从正在训练的LLM策略中获得偏好注释，这已由 Yuan 等人（2024 年）进行了探索，并被命名为“自我奖励”。简而言之，其核心思想类似于以LLM作为评判者的在线 DPO，但对响应的偏好不是来自外部的LLM，而是来自正在训练的策略。该算法总结如下：

(30)for x in  D:sample two responses a1,a2∼πθt(⋅|x)annotate them by πθt to get a+,a−update θt by loss ℓDPO(θt)≜log⁡σ[ηlog⁡πθt(a+|x)π0(a+|x)−ηlog⁡πθt(a−|x)π0(a−|x)] t=t+1

The gist of self-rewarding is that the off-the-shelf LLM to be aligned can provide effective feedback to the alignment of itself, suppose that distinguish a response of higher quality is an easier task compared with generating a reqsponse of high quality. Although this assumption is debatable as we discussed in Section 4.1, self-rewarding makes the alignment scalable since the best-performing base model can always be utilized to provide feedback for itself. In contrast to the weak-to-strong from OpenAI, self-rewarding is like strongest-to-strongest.
自我奖励的要点在于，待对齐的现成LLM能够为其自身的对齐提供有效反馈，假设区分高质量的响应比生成高质量的响应是一个更容易的任务。尽管如我们在第 4.1 节中所讨论的，这个假设是有争议的，但自我奖励使对齐具有可扩展性，因为表现最佳的基础模型总是可以被用来为其自身提供反馈。与 OpenAI 的从弱到强不同，自我奖励就像是从最强到最强。

Another example is the GAN-like algorithm Self-Play fIne-tuNing (SPIN), which takes an offline SFT dataset D as the input and the goal is to fully use the SFT data so that the generation distribution of the LLM is indistinguished from the data distribution. The core of SPIN is the self-play mechanism, where both the main player and the opponent are the same LLM, but from different iteration. Specifically, SPIN maintains 1) main player, which is the LLM at current iteration, serving as the discriminator to distinguish opponent's responses from ground truth responses (SFT data); 2) opponent player, which is the LLM from previous iteration, with the goal of generating responses to be indistinguishable to the SFT data. SPIN proceeds iteratively and consists of two steps at each iteration: (1) training the main player and (2) update the opponent player. If training succeeds, the ultimate generation distribution is indistinguishable from the SFT data thus fully utilizing the SFT data.
另一个例子是类似 GAN 的算法自我博弈微调（SPIN），它将离线 SFT 数据集 D 作为输入，目标是充分利用 SFT 数据，以使LLM的生成分布与数据分布无法区分。SPIN 的核心是自我博弈机制，其中主玩家和对手都是相同的LLM，但来自不同的迭代。具体来说，SPIN 维护 1）主玩家，即当前迭代的LLM，作为判别器，用于区分对手的响应与真实响应（SFT 数据）；2）对手玩家，即来自上一次迭代的LLM，其目标是生成与 SFT 数据无法区分的响应。SPIN 迭代进行，每次迭代包括两个步骤：（1）训练主玩家和（2）更新对手玩家。如果训练成功，最终的生成分布与 SFT 数据无法区分，从而充分利用了 SFT 数据。

5 Beyond the Bradley-Terry Model

5 超越BT模型

Following the IPO work introduced above, a major concern about the classic RLHF framework is whether the BT model can capture the complicated human preference.
继上文介绍的首次公开募股（IPO）工作之后，关于经典的 RLHF 框架的一个主要担忧是 BT 模型是否能够捕捉复杂的人类偏好。

  • Total order over response space: Assuming a r∗ implies a total order over the response space:
    总体顺序覆盖响应空间：假设 r∗ 意味着对响应空间的总体顺序：

    • This is inconsistent with the ``contrast effect'' and is unlikely to hold when we aggregate the preference over a diverse set of labelers.
      这与“对比效应”不一致，并且当我们对来自不同的标注者群体的偏好进行汇总时，这种情况不太可能成立。

(31)P(a1>a2|x)>0.5&P(a2>a3|x)>0.5→P(a1>a3|x)>0.5

  • Collapse in generation diversity: reward-maximizer tends to lose the decreases the entropy;
    生成多样性的崩溃：奖励最大化者往往会降低熵值

  • Overlook the minority preference: the BT-framework does not take personalization and preference conflict into consideration and is likely to align toward the majority group and overlook the preference of the minority group.
    忽视少数群体的偏好：BT 框架未将个性化和偏好冲突考虑在内，很可能倾向于多数群体，而忽视少数群体的偏好。

5.1 Nash Learning: Dropping the Reward Model

5.1 纳什学习：舍弃奖励模型

One direct modification is to drop the reward structure, and treat the RLHF as a two-player Game between two LLMs π1 and π2. This is referred to as the Nash Learning (NLHF). To illustrate the idea of Nash learning, we define the relative preference as
一种直接的修改是放弃奖励结构，并将 RLHF 视为两个LLMs π1 和 π2 之间的双人博弈。这被称为纳什学习（NLHF）。为了说明纳什学习的理念，我们将相对偏好定义为

(32)R∗(x,a1,a2)=log⁡P(a1≻a2|x,a1,a2)P(a1≺a2|x,a1,a2),

Then, the value of the game is defined as
然后，博弈的价值被定义为

(33)J(π1,π2)=Ex∼d0Ea1∼π1,a2∼π2[R∗(x,a1,a2)−ηKL(π1(⋅|x)∥π0(⋅|x))+ηKL(π2(⋅|x)∥π0(⋅|x))].

If we only consider the policy with the same support as π0, there exists a unique and symmetric Nash equilibrium of the following minimax problem:
若我们仅考虑与 π0 具有相同支持的策略，则存在以下极小极大问题的唯一且对称的纳什均衡：

(34)(π∗1,π∗2)=(π∗,π∗)=arg⁡maxπ1∈Πarg⁡minπ2∈ΠJ(π1,π2),

where J(π∗,π∗)=0 by the anti-symmetric structure. Suppose that we can find an ϵ-approximate Nash policy π^1 for the first player in the sense that
其中 J(π∗,π∗)=0 由反对称结构给出。假设我们能够为第一个参与者找到一个在某种意义上的 ϵ -近似纳什策略 π^1 ，使得

(35)J(π1∗,π2∗)−minπ2J(π^1,π2)⏟The strongest opponent=0−minπ2J(π^1,π2)≤ϵ

  • Consistently outperform All the opponents:
    始终超越所有对手

(36)minπ2∈ΠEx∼d0Ea1∼π^1,a2∼π2[R∗(x,a1,a2)−ηKL(π^1(⋅|x)∥π0(⋅|x))+ηKL(π2(⋅|x)∥π0(⋅|x))]≥−ϵ.

  • Consistently being preferred with small KL coefficient
    始终以较小的 KL 系数被优先选择

    (37)minπ2∈ΠEx∼d0Ea1∼π^1,a2∼π2P(x,a1,a2)>11+exp⁡(ϵ)≈0.5.

  • Automatically adapt to the reward framework: when the BT model holds, the Nash policy also maximizes the KL-regularized reward up to ϵ.
    自动适应奖励框架：当 BT 模型成立时，纳什策略也会在 ϵ 范围内使 KL 正则化奖励最大化。

NLHF is a game-theoretic learning paradigm and does not attain a closed-form solution as the single-agent case. However, combing the fact that the unique Nash equilibrium is symmetric, we can show that
NLHF 是一种博弈论学习范式，不像单智能体情况那样能获得封闭形式的解。然而，结合唯一的纳什均衡是对称的这一事实，我们可以证明

(38)π∗(a|x)∝π0(a|x)exp⁡(−1ηEa′∼π∗(a′|x)R(x,a,a′)),

where the π∗ appears on both sides. We mention in passing that the offline IPO can be viewed as a special case of the game by fixing the second opponent as the data distribution.
当 π∗ 出现在两边时。顺便提一下，通过将第二个对手固定为数据分布，离线首次公开募股（IPO）可以被视为该博弈的一个特殊情况。

An initial planning algorithm is presented in the original Nash Learning paper. The NLHF is still an under-explored and promising learning paradigm, with many interesting problems to be solved.
在最初的纳什学习论文中提出了一种初始规划算法。NLHF 仍然是一个未被充分探索且有前途的学习范式，还有许多有趣的问题有待解决。

5.2 Multi-objective Learning and Human-preference-aware Alignment

5.2 多目标学习与人类偏好感知的对齐

Another fundamental issue of the single-reward model cannot capture the conflict preference among humans. This is because humans typically have a set of intricate or even contradictory targets in real-world applications. In view of this, it is natural to adopt a multi-objective formulation to replace the scalar reward with a reward vector r∈Rk.
单奖励模型的另一个基本问题是无法捕捉人类之间的冲突偏好。这是因为在实际应用中，人类通常具有一系列复杂甚至相互矛盾的目标。鉴于此，采用多目标公式来用奖励向量 r∈Rk 代替标量奖励是很自然的。

For instance, in LLaMA2 project, the helpfulness reward and safety reward are trained separately, leading to k=2. Meanwhile, in the nvidia/HelpSteer dataset, each sample is evaluated in helpfulness, correctness, coherence, complexity, and verbosity by the humans in a scale of 0-5. We plot the Spearman correlation coefficients of these different objectives as follows, where we can see that some of the objectives (helpfulness and correctness) are positively related, while some of them (e.g., verbosity, complexity and coherence) are negatively related.
例如，在 LLaMA2 项目中，有用性奖励和安全性奖励是分别训练的，导致 k=2 。同时，在 nvidia/HelpSteer 数据集中，每个样本的有用性、正确性、连贯性、复杂性和冗长性由人类以 0 - 5 的等级进行评估。我们绘制了这些不同目标的斯皮尔曼相关系数如下，从中可以看到，一些目标（有用性和正确性）呈正相关，而有些目标（例如，冗长性、复杂性和连贯性）呈负相关。

Moreover, even the LLMs have their own preference in terms of different objectives, as demonstrated by this study:
此外，正如本研究所示，即使是LLMs在不同目标方面也有自己的偏好：

To handle the multi-objective RLHF, a popular approach is based on parameter interpolation, meaning that for each objective i, we can train a model θi. Then, given a new user with preference ν1,⋯,νk, the final model is given by
为处理多目标 RLHF，一种流行的方法是基于参数插值，这意味着对于每个目标 i ，我们可以训练一个模型 θi 。然后，对于具有偏好 ν1,⋯,νk 的新用户，最终模型由以下方式给出

(39)θ=θ1ν1+⋯+θkνk.

The coefficient combination in the parameter space leads to a preference objective combination, and performs well in practice. However, one needs to store all the base models θ1,⋯,θk, and cannot use a single model to serve a diverse group of users, thus is inference-unfriendly.
在参数空间中的系数组合会导致偏好目标组合，并且在实践中表现良好。然而，需要存储所有的基础模型 θ1,⋯,θk ，并且不能使用单个模型为不同的用户群体提供服务，因此对推理不友好。

In recognition of the above concerns, another idea is to embed the human-preference into the input, leading to the multi-objective preference-aware alignment. Specifically, we model the human preference as a direction, i.e., a unit vector ν∈Rk and the preference-conditioned reward is
鉴于上述问题，另一个想法是将人类偏好嵌入到输入中，从而实现多目标偏好感知对齐。具体来说，我们将人类偏好建模为一个方向，即一个单位向量 ν∈Rk ，并且偏好条件奖励是

(40)R(x,ν,a)=ν⊤r(x,a)

The learning objective is accordingly modified as
相应地，学习目标被修改为

(41)maxπEν∼dνJ(ν,π)=maxπEν∼dνEx∼d0,a∼π(⋅|x,ν)[R(x,ν,a)].

There is also work considering the robust preference learning in the face of multiple user groups, by optimizing the worst-user-group preference.
也有一些工作通过优化最差用户群体的偏好来考虑在面对多个用户群体时的鲁棒偏好学习。

Three take-away messages are
三个要点是

  • Single-reward is short in expressivity: while a multi-objective formulation can provide more fine-grained characterization for the complicated human preference (scalar v.s. vector);
    单奖励的表达能力有限：虽然多目标公式可以为复杂的人类偏好（标量与向量）提供更精细的特征描述；

  • Humans and LLMs possess different preferences: it is reported that human-human agreement and human-GPT-3.5-Turbo agreement are about 60% - 65%;
    人类和LLMs具有不同的偏好：据报道，人与人之间的一致性以及人与 GPT-3.5-Turbo 之间的一致性约为 60％ - 65％；

  • Human-preference-aware alignment: the user information can be embedded into the input space to mitigate the preference conflict.
    人类偏好感知对齐：用户信息可嵌入输入空间以缓解偏好冲突。

5.3 Pointwise Feedback - Kahneman-Tversky Optimization

5.3 逐点反馈 - Kahneman-Tversky 优化

Another direction to go beyond the commonly used Bradley-Terry model is to replace pairwise feedback with pointwise feedback. In the later case, the system only needs to collect whether a response a is desired to the prompt x. So, instead of collecting triplets (x,a+,a−), we only need (x,a,+/−).
超越常用的 Bradley-Terry 模型的另一个方向是以逐点反馈取代成对反馈。在后一种情况下，系统只需要收集对prompt x 的响应 a 是否是期望的。因此，我们只需要 (x,a,+/−) ，而不是收集三元组 (x,a+,a−) 。

Such signals cost much less to collect than preferences over pairs of responses:
收集此类信号的成本远低于收集对成对响应的偏好的成本：

  1. Just need to do the forward pass of an LLM once to generate a single response. A pair of responses, on the other hand, require twice the forward passes. So, we save half of the price on serving the models.
    只需对一个LLM进行一次前向传递以生成单个响应。另一方面，一对响应需要进行两次前向传递。因此，我们在为模型提供服务时节省了一半的成本。

  2. Implicit feedback (+/−) are far more than the explicit feedback. For example, in a music AI, we can safely assume negative feedback if a user skips the generated song after listening to the first 10 seconds.
    隐性反馈（ +/− ）远比显性反馈多。例如，在一个音乐人工智能中，如果用户在听了生成的歌曲的前 10 秒后跳过该歌曲，我们可以有把握地认为这是负面反馈。

To implement the above idea, Ethayarajh et al. (2024) proposed the Kahneman-Tversky Optimization (KTO) algorithm which is intruded briefly as follows.
为了实现上述想法，Ethayarajh 等人（2024 年）提出了卡尼曼 - 特沃斯基优化（KTO）算法，该算法简要介绍如下。

Prospect Theory by Kahneman & Tversky

Kahneman-Tversky 的前景理论

Unlike the core objective of RLHF, Kahneman & Tversky’s prospect theory argues that people do not aim to maximize expected reward when facing an uncertain event. Instead, because people are loss-averse, they are actually more sensitive to losses than gains in the same degree.
与 RLHF 的核心目标不同，卡尼曼和特沃斯基的前景理论认为，人们在面对不确定事件时，并非旨在最大化预期回报。相反，由于人们是厌恶损失的，他们对同等程度的损失实际上比对收益更为敏感。

The utility function of an outcome following prospect theory can then be formulated as
根据前景理论，一个结果的效用函数可以表述为

(42)u(Z)≜∑z∈Zwz⋅v(z−zref)

where Z={z} is a random variable representing outcomes, w is a weighting function capturing how much humans overestimate the probability of rare events, and v:z↦R is a value function estimating the sensitivity of losses/gains of an outcome z relative to a reference point zref.
其中 Z={z} 是表示结果的随机变量， w 是一个加权函数，用于捕捉人类高估罕见事件概率的程度， v:z↦R 是一个值函数，用于估计结果 z 相对于参考点 zref 的损失/收益的敏感性。

Below, the authors of KTO paper plot the implied utility functions by various methods we’ve discussed above.
如下，KTO 论文的作者们通过我们上述讨论的各种方法绘制了隐含的效用函数。

From https://arxiv.org/abs/2402.01306

KTO’s Objective Function in Practice

KTO 在实践中的目标函数

Below, we sketch the offline KTO objective function following Ethayarajh et al. (2024) in practice.
下面，我们根据 Ethayarajh 等人（2024 年）的实际情况，简述离线 KTO 目标函数。

(43)ℓKTO(θ)=∑x,a[w(a)(1−v(x,a;β))]

These functions are implemented as follows:
这些功能的实现方式如下：

w(a)={λDif a∼a+|xλUif a∼a−|x

where λD and λU are hyperparameters

其中 λD 和 λU 是超参数

 

v(x,a;β)={σ(r(x,a)−aref)if a∼a+|xσ(−r(x,a)+aref)if a∼a−|x

wherer(x,a)=βlog⁡πθ(a|x)πref(a|x) takes the optimal reward function derivated by the DPO work.

其中 r(x,a)=βlog⁡πθ(a|x)πref(a|x) 采用由 DPO 工作导出的最优奖励函数。

 

aref=Ex′[βDKL[πθ(y′|x′)||πref(y′|x′)]] is the expected expected KL divergence between the currenct policy πθ and the reference policy πref.

aref=Ex′[βDKL[πθ(y′|x′)||πref(y′|x′)]] 是当前策略 πθ 与参考策略 πref 之间预期的预期 KL 散度。

 

The specification of these functions rely quite much on heuristics. We hereby only list the authors’ choices in the following section.
这些功能的规范在很大程度上依赖于启发式方法。我们在此仅在以下部分列出作者的选择。

Implementation Choices

实施选择

  • β value: the authors found that β=0.1 is close to best on vairous tasks. On the other hand, the Huggingface’s H4 team found that β=0.0 leads to even better performance in their experiments. We hereby want to emphasise that both teams evaluated KTO by the performance of models on tasks, which is not the objective of aligning models. It’s hardly to tell whether this is a generally good choice with the evidence so far.
    β 值：作者发现 β=0.1 在各种任务中接近最佳。另一方面，Huggingface 的 H4 团队发现 β=0.0 在他们的实验中能带来更好的性能。在此我们想要强调，两个团队都是通过模型在任务上的表现来评估 KTO，这并非是alignment的目标。就目前的证据而言，很难说这是否是一个普遍的好选择。

  • λD and λU: the values of these two hyper-parameters are roughly inversely proportional to the ratio of desired responses a+ and undesired responses a−, i.e. λDnDλUnU∈[1,43].
    λD 和 λU ：这两个超参数的值大致与期望响应 a+ 和非期望响应 a− 的比率成反比，即 λDnDλUnU∈[1,43] 。

  • a^ref: this might be the most tricky issue in our opinion. In KTO paper, the authors use a batch of size m to estimate this term by max(0,1m∑log⁡πθ(yU′|x′)πref(yU′|x′)) which is a Monte-Carlo estimation with only undiresed responses. Notice that this step costs quite many flops!
    a^ref ：在我们看来，这可能是最棘手的问题。在 KTO 论文中，作者使用大小为 m 的一批数据，通过 max(0,1m∑log⁡πθ(yU′|x′)πref(yU′|x′)) 来估计这个项，这是一种仅使用无向响应的蒙特卡罗估计。请注意，这一步需要相当多的浮点运算次数！

Notice that, the KTO’s performance so far is evaluated more on tasks like MMLU or GSM8K, which we argue is not the most appropriate way. However, one super interesting results is about the data efficiency of KTO with only one response per prompt. As shown in the Table by Ethayarajh et al. (2024) below, compared with DPO trained with two responses per prompt, KTO with one can significantly outperform it. This finding further signifies the pratical value of KTO, as pointwise feedback are more abundant and easier to collect in practice!
请注意，到目前为止，对 KTO 的性能评估更多地是在诸如 MMLU 或 GSM8K 等任务上进行的，我们认为这并不是最合适的方式。然而，一个非常有趣的结果是关于 KTO 的数据效率，每个prompt仅一个响应。正如 Ethayarajh 等人（2024 年）在下表中所示，与每个prompt有两个响应的 DPO 训练相比，只有一个响应的 KTO 可以显著优于它。这一发现进一步表明了 KTO 的实际价值，因为在实践中，逐点反馈更丰富且更容易收集！

From KTO: Model Alignment as Prospect Theoretic Optimization
从 KTO：作为前景理论优化的模型对齐

6 Other Research Directions; End note

6 其他研究方向；尾注

In this blog post, we presented a brief overview of the preference learning in the context of language model. There are many other active research topics or interesting research problems we have not covered:
在这篇博客文章中，我们在语言模型的背景下对偏好学习进行了简要概述。还有许多其他活跃的研究主题或有趣的研究问题我们未涵盖：

  • Superalignment - weak2strong
    超对齐 - 弱到强

    • When LLMs become more intelligent, we might not be able to align/supervised them in the future (may not be very near). In this case, we still want to ensure that those superhuman models are aligned. One promising way is to use weaker models to align stronger ones, which can be implemented in the following two fashions.
      当LLMs变得更加智能时，我们未来可能无法对其进行调整/监督（也许不会很快）。在这种情况下，我们仍然希望确保那些超人模型是对齐的。一种有前途的方法是使用较弱的模型来对齐较强的模型，这可以通过以下两种方式来实现。

    • Supervised learning: As propsed and shown by OpenAI, weaker supervisor models can elicit capabilities of stronger models, thus makes it possible to align stronger models with weaker ones.
      监督学习：如 OpenAI 所提出和展示的，较弱的监督模型可以引发较强模型的能力，从而使得较强模型与较弱模型能够对齐。

    • Discriminating generations: In contrast, OAIF by Guo et al. (2024) shows that weak LLMs can raise useful and effective preference over responses to generation from stronger models, which weaker AI takes an easier discriminative task.
      Discriminating generations：相比之下，郭等人（2024 年）的 OAIF 表明，弱LLMs可以对来自更强模型的生成的响应产生有用且有效的偏好，较弱的 AI 承担了一个更容易的区分任务。

    • Open question: any other ways for us to align superhuman models? Especially the methods that don’t rely on AI.
      Open question：我们使超人类模型协调一致的其他方法有哪些？尤其是那些不依赖人工智能的方法。

  • Preference optimization for other generative models
    其他生成模型的偏好优化

    • diffusion model;
      扩散模型

    • multi-modal LLM;
      多模态 LLM;

  • Preference Signal Construction
    偏好信号构建

    • Human feedback alone will not be sufficient to exercise scalable oversight for superhuman AI systems
      仅靠人类反馈不足以对超人类人工智能系统进行可扩展的监督

      • human miss over half of the critical error in evaluating summarized passages;
        人类在评估总结性段落时会错过一半以上的关键错误；

      • weak-to-strong generalization for superalignment;
        超级对齐的从弱到强泛化；

      • it is not feasible to expect the humans to put extensive research and efforts in practice;
        期望人类在实践中进行广泛的研究和付出大量努力是不可行的；

    • Implicit feedback signal: we hereby use music AI such as Suno as an example. Suppose an user plays a generated song for only 5 seconds, we can safely assume that the user dislike it. Therefore, it’s possible to extract such implicit feedback from user in practice.
      隐性反馈信号：在此我们以音乐人工智能（如 Suno）为例。假设用户播放一首生成的歌曲仅 5 秒钟，我们可以合理地认为该用户不喜欢它。因此，在实际中有可能从用户那里提取这种隐性反馈。

  • Alignment for reasoning
    用于推理的对齐

    • Mathematical reasoning 数学推理

    • Coding 编码

    • Agent

  • Alignment Tax
    校准代价

    • The models may suffer from performance degradation on particular tasks after alignment.
      模型在对齐后可能会在特定任务上出现性能下降的情况。

    • E.g., the calibration is reduced (Figure 8 of GPT4-report);
      例如，校准值降低（GPT4 报告的图 8）；

    • Some initial study
      一些初步的研究

Alignment for foundation generative model is still an active research direction and is still developing rapidly toward the goal of AGI.
基础生成模型的对齐仍是一个活跃的研究方向，并正朝着通用人工智能的目标快速发展。
